<p>1a</p>
<p>1b</p>
<p>1b.1\] ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ar+g+ha bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ ar+g+ha'i cho ga /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgyal ba rnam 'phro shin tu rnam rgyal byang chub pa/ / 
<p>1b.2</p>rig ma'i lus sbyor las skyes bde bas shin tu khyab pa'i sku/ /'khrul pa ma lus spangs shing 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad la/ /phyag byas nas ni 'dus pa'i gzhung gi ar+g+ha'i cho ga bshad/ /gtsug
<p>1b.3</p>lag khang dang mchod rten ras ris gsung rab sku gzugs dang / /khang bzangs gzhal med khang dang khyams dang rdzing bu wa chu rnams/ /khron pa chu mig shing bzangs ljon shing rnams kyi nags/ /rtsed mo'i
<p>1b.4</p>de'u skyed mos tshal ni sbyin pa'i sa la mdor bsdus na'o/ /de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gzhan gyis maN+Dal sngon du song bas lan gnyis sam gsum gsol ba
<p>1b.5</p>btab pas sam/ rang nyid bsod nams 'dod pa la sogs pas gtsug lag khang brtsig pa'i phyir bgros pas nyin zhag dge ba rgyu skar bzang po la tho rangs kyi dus su sa brtag par bya'o/ /tsiny+tsa skyer pa
<p>2a</p>
<p>2a.1</p>ba hur rams shing dang / /ko pi da ra ka rany+dza dang yungs kar dgod/ /ri yi ze'u 'bras bur bcas dang rus sbal rgyan dang ni/ /glang po'i bshul pa lta bu'i sa ni rnam par spang / /shar phyogs su ni pi pa
<p>2a.2</p>la yi shing rnams dang / /pAg sha'i shing dang gshin rje'i phyogs su yang dag ldan/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi ljon shing rnams dang nub phyogs su/ /sa gzhi'i byang phyogs su ni ba ku la dang bcas/ /me yi mtshams su ka ku b+he dang yang
<p>2a.3</p>dag ldan/ /pa la sha yi ljon shing srin po'i phyogs su grags/ /sa skyes shal ma li ni rlung gi phyogs su ste/ /dbang ldan u dum+WA rar bcas pa'i sa gzhi spang / /mya ngan med dang pri yang ku dang ku sha nim/ /a shwad+tha
<p>2a.4</p>mal mo tsa la ku tsa dang ni/ /a mra da dim sa ni byang dang shar du gzhol/ /sa ni dkar ldan gru bzhi yang ni mtshan nyid bzang / /de ru dong ni gru bzhir brkos te de nyid las/ /byung ba'i sa yis de ni dgang bar bya ba nyid/ /de ni
<p>2a.5</p>gal te ma khengs na ni ma bsngags so/ /gal te sa ni dang po las lhag rab tu bsngags/ /sa yi khung bu mtho gang tsam du brkos nas su/ /de ni lhag med chu yis rab tu dgang bar bya/ /gom pa brgya ni song nas log ste blta
<p>2b</p>
<p>2b.1</p>bar bya/ /chu ni gal te ma 'grib dge ba'o gzhan du gzhan/ /sa la gnas pa'i chu ni g.yas skor gyis/ /dbang ldan mtshams su myur du bab na ni/ /brtan byed sa gzhi shin tu dag pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i dus su yang ni nyams pa med/ /de la de ltar sa'i mtshan nyid rig pa'i
<p>2b.2</p>sngags pas lus bkru zhing dri zhim pas ji ltar rnyed pas gos dang rgyan dang cod pan dang bde ba'i stan mthon po la 'dug ste/ dgos pa yong su tshang ba dang bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas pa 'grub pas lag pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas mnyam par gzhag par bya ste/ lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas
<p>2b.3</p>dgongs ka zhi ba'i gtor ma byin te/ dag pa'am sbyangs pa'i sa gzhir lci ba dang sas ba lang gi ko ba tsam byugs pa'i dbus su maN+Dal bya ba 'am byed du gzhug go/ /de nas de ru dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms la mchod pa lnga yis de la yang dag par mchod de/ gtor ma rgya chen
<p>2b.4</p>po man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du sbyangs te/ phyogs skyong ba thams cad la tu R+Ya'i sgra dang bcas pas 'bul lo/ /de'i rjes la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas lus btud de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang lha rnams las bslang bar bya'o/ /khams gsum gang na
<p>2b.5</p>sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /lha klu gnod sbyin chen po dang / /dri za rnams dang lha min sogs/ /thams cad la ni gsol bar 'tshal/ /sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir/ /sa yi cha ni mdzes pa 'dir/ /gtsug lag 'byor pa rgyas phyir dang / /thos dang
<p>2b.6</p>bsam sogs 'phel ba yi/ /dam pa'i ches ni rtogs phyir dang / /grags pa mthar thug gtsug lag khang / /lus can kun gyi yang dag 'tsho/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /bzang po 'di ni bdag phyir yang / /khyed la gnod pa mi mnga' bas/ /grags pa dam pa bgyid par
<p>2b.7</p>'tshal/ /khyed kyis bzod cing gnang ba ni/ /bgyid par 'tshal gyi gzhan du min/ /rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yis/ /dge ba'i sa 'di bdag la stsol/ /zhes bya bas so/ /de ltar lan gsum brjod nas oM mu tsu le swA hA/ oM mo hA ni swA hA/ oM dat+ta li swA hA/ zhes bya ba rmi lam
<p>3a</p>
<p>3a.1</p>ston pa'i sngags 'dis lag pa g.yon pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mngon par bsngags te/ sa phyogs gtsang mar gos dang rgyan gtsang mas sngas lhor bstan te/ ba shar du bltas pas seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis nyal bar bya'o/ /yang na rje btsun 'jig rten dbang
<p>3a.2</p>phyug yang dag par mchod de/ de dang nye bar snga ma bzhin nyal bar bya'o/ /tho rangs rmi lam gyi mtshan ma dge mi dge nye bar gzung bar bya ste/ rmi lam sangs rgyas zhal mthong dang / /mchod rten sku gzugs mchod pa dang / /dam chos nyan dang de shes pa'i/ /dge slong dge 'dun mthong ba
<p>3a.3</p>dang / /gtsug lag khang dang sangs rgyas sras/ /dge slong ma rnams skyed mos tshal/ /sa 'dzin 'dzegs dang bsti gnas dang / /chu bo rdzing bu rgya mtsho dang / /ri bo can dang ri dgas dang / /e na ya dang ba la bsngags/ /ngur pa rma bya la sogs khyad 'phags 'dab gshog can/ /ting
<p>3a.4</p>'dzin ldan pas rmi lam du ni nges par mthong / /bzhon pa glang chen khyu mchog dang ni sa 'dzin dang / /gzhal med gnas mchog dpag bsam gyi ni shing rnams dang / /dge bsnyen dang ni sdom can mi yi bdag po rnams/ /gsang sngags dbang phyug rnams dang bud med mchog/ 
<p>3a.5</p>pha dang ma dang lha rnams dang ni bla ma dang / /lha yi btsun mo rnams dang mchog gi gsang ba pa/ /sgrub po dam pa dang ni yon tan can dang gnyis skyes rnams/ /dga' ston chen po dang ni rgyal ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /rgyan rnams dang ni gos dang 'bru dang nor dang
<p>3a.6</p>mchog /sbyin sreg las dang 'bras bu dang ni me tog rnams/ /rgyal po dbang bskur thob byed phun sum tshogs pa'i dngos/ /g.yul las rgyal dang rkun po bcings dang rang gi tshogs/ /rgya mtsho dang ni chu bo rnams dang 'phrang la sogs/ /rgal bar dka' ba rnams las nges
<p>3a.7</p>par thar ba yang / /der de lta bu la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni bzang ste/ de las bzlog pa ni ngan par shes nas gal te ngan pa mthong na de'i tsho bgegs mthar mdzad kyi sngags bzlas te/ chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rmi lam nye bar mi dmigs pa'i nye bar len pas so zhes lhag par
<p>3b</p>
<p>3b.1</p>mos pas sam/ yang na rmi lam ston pa'i sngags brjod pas/ rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bya'o/ /de nas rmi lam bzang po 'am bzang por bsgyur nas/ oM b+hu khaM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis nam mkha' lta bur bsams nas/ hUM laM hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin gyis
<p>3b.2</p>gzhi rnam par bsgoms nas/ oM me di nI badzra b+ha ba badzra ban+d+ha hUM zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas der lus phyed 'thon pa gser gyi mdog can rin po che'i bum pa phyag na bsnams shing na bza' dang rgyan mchog dang ldan pa'i sa'i lha mo mdun du rnam par bltas te/ tshigs su
<p>3b.3</p>bcad pa gnyis kyis lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /'byung po kun gyi 'dren pa yin/ /spyod pa'i tshul gyi bya ba dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde/ /bcom nas
<p>3b.4</p>gtsug lag khang mchog byed/ /ces bya bas so/ /lan gsum du ni bskul nas su/ /sa la yon chab la sogs pa/ /nye bar spyod pa legs mchod de/ /de nyid du ni thim par bsam/ /de nas yongs su dag pa thob pa'i sa'i char sems mgu ba'i sngags pas chos thams cad
<p>3b.5</p>rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes lhag par mos pas chos thams cad kun du spyod do/ /sna tshogs pad+mar sna tshogs rdo rje'i stegs bu la/ /zla bar b+hUM las dag pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /de yi ltir gnas b+h+rUM gyi 'od kyi dra ba las/ /nges par 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
<p>3b.6</p>cad rnams/ /kun nas bsdus te gyur ba las ni khyad 'phags pa'i/ /rig ma mchog ni bzhi po las byung mdzes pa yi/ /khang pa brtsegs pa thar pa'i grong khyer ngo mtshar can/ /nor bu chen po 'od 'bar ba yi rang bzhin rab tu blta/ /der ni dkyil 'khor dri bzangs sogs kyis byas nas ni/ / 
<p>3b.7</p>'di la dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rnam par bsgom par bya/ /de la sna tshogs nyer spyod rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /phyogs rnams su ni rim pa bzhin du gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas dri zhim po'i me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mos oM sarba ta thA ga ta su la li ta/ bi lA si nA mi tai rnA mA mi b+ha ga bAn+ti
<p>4a</p>
<p>4a.1</p>dzaHhUM baM hoH/ pra tIts+tsha ku su ma any+dza li nA tha ho/ zhes brjod bzhin du steng du bltas te snyim pas me tog gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te lag pa g.yas pas dri zhim po'i bdug spos kyi reng bu bzung nas sngags lce la hUM yig las byung ba'i
<p>4a.2</p>rdo rje dkar po phra mo rnam par bsgoms nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang gzhan dag kyang snyan gsan dbab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan che ge rdo rje mchog /rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal stod/ /mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid bdag /gtsug lag khang
<p>4a.3</p>ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan gus byed bdag la ni/ /rjes su gzung bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo'i don mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dgra bcom pa/ /'jig rten
<p>4a.4</p>skyong dang gsang sngags lha/ /gang gzhan rnams dang 'jig rten skyong / /lha rnams dang ni rdzogs sangs kyi/ /bstan la gnas pa'i 'byung po dang / /sems can gang zhig bstan dga' ba/ /rdo rje'i mig ldan dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje can bdag che ge mo/ /gtsug lag khang
<p>4a.5</p>ni cho ga bzhin/ /'gro ba rnams ni dag bya'i phyir/ /ci nus bya ba bgyid par 'tshal/ /de phyir bdag dang slob ma la/ /rjes su brtse bas nyer dgongs te/ /'dir ni 'khor bcas thams cad kyis/ /gdan ni gnod par mdzad pa'i rigs/ /de ltar lan gsum brjod pas
<p>4a.6</p>snyan gsan phab nas yang dag par mchod de bstod pa yang bya'o/ /de nas legs par brtags shing shin tu mnyam pa'i sa'i char stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ mdun du chu gtsang ku sha'i tshom bu dang bcas pa dang / 'om dUr ba dang bcas pa dang / dri chu me tog dkar po dang bcas pa chu la
<p>4a.7</p>sogs pa'i snod yongs su bzlas pa rnams g.yon du rim pas bzhag cing / ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas bum pa lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de la nag po dang rtsa ba med pa/ mchu 'phyang ba/ mgrin pa ring ba lto ba che bar nas dang gro dang 'bras so ba dang ma sha dar
<p>4b</p>
<p>4b.1</p>til rnams te 'bru lnga dang / br-i ha ti dang ka N+Da ka ri dang a par dzi ta dkar po dang / ha sa dang ha sa de ba rnams te sman lnga dang / gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang byi ru dang / mu men te rin po che lnga dang ldan pa/ dri'i chus gang btsu ta la sogs pa'i yal gas kha brgyan pa gos zung gis mgrin pa dkris
<p>4b.2</p>pa/ de la chos 'byung gi nang du gnas pa rang gi lha'i mtshan mas mtshan pa/ yi ge baM las rin po che'i rang bzhin las byas nas gdugs dang bcas par 'khor dang bcas pa'i bdag por kun du btags te/ me tog gi phreng bas dkris pa'i rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du bzhag
<p>4b.3</p>ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje dang 'brel pa'i me tog gi phreng ba'i rtse mo bzung nas/ sngags pas yi ge gsum dang spel te rang gi lha'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du gzhan dkyil 'khor ba'i bum pa rnams kyang cho ga de bzhin du lha rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa
<p>4b.4</p>byas nas dkyil 'khor ba'i lhas byin gyis brlabs pa rnams la rang rang gi sngags yi ge gsum dang spel ba lan bdun du mngon par bzla bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du gzhi bdag gi bum pa yang ji lta bar rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa rnams la yi ge gsum dang spel bas rang rang gi sngags bzlas par bya'o/ / 
<p>4b.5</p>thams cad kyang srog ldan nya dang bcas pa rnams la rim pa bzhin lhag par gnas par byas nas/ bsang gtor la sogs pa byas te mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod de/ dril bu dkrol bzhin pas bstod par bya'o/ /de nas las byed kyi skyes bu bgegs mthar byed kyi rnam par bsgoms te/ 
<p>4b.6</p>rgya dang zabs su khru do ba'i dong gru bzhi par brkos la dbang ldan du de'i tshad dam/ de'i phyed du zlum por brkos te srol btod nas gnyis ka lci ba dang sa dang chu rnams kyis byug go/ /de nas ar+g+ha la sogs pa byin nas dong gru bzhi par go rims bzhin rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum pa
<p>4b.7</p>rnams kyis chu blugs par bya'o/ /der shar ram byang du ba ltas te nya rnams 'phyo ba na gtsug lag khang 'khor dang bcas pa myur du 'grub par 'dod pa yin no/ /de nas de'i sbubs phye ste dong zlum por chu btang ngo / /de'i chu'i bskor phyogs brtag par bya'o/ /gal te chu g.yas skor du 'bab na
<p>5a</p>
<p>5a.1</p>der dge slong brtul zhugs dam pa yon tan rnams nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rjes la klu ma lus pa dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ der 'o ma can gyi yal ga rnams kyis g.yogs te nyi ma la gnas pa'i dzaM yig las byung ba'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las/ dzaM gu
<p>5a.2</p>li sku mdog ser po zhal ser po dang nag po dang dkar po/ gdengs ka bdun gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can/ rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang snang gi thabs la 'khyud pa/ g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa/ g.yon gnyis kyis gzhu dang sdigs mdzub dang
<p>5a.3</p>bcas pa'i zhags pa can/ sna tshogs pa'i na bza' dang bcas pa'i sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od can bsgoms nas bdag nyid kyang dzaM gu li'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms te/ sa 'og tu dmigs nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi bsgom par
<p>5a.4</p>bya'o/ /de'i tshe yang ltad mo ba'i skye bo rnams tam+bo la dang dri zhim po'i me tog dang / tsan+dan la sogs pa byin pas mgu bar bya'o/ /de nas bsrung ba'i don du mchod sbyin gyi shing ngam seng ldeng gi rang bzhin las bde bar gshegs pa'i sor gyi brgyad kyi tshad du steng dang 'og rtse lnga ba dang
<p>5a.5</p>rtse gcig pa'i rdo rje'i rnam pa can tsan+dan dmar pos byugs pa me tog dang skud pa dang / yungs kar dang bcas pa rnams la bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gdab par bya'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta la/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM hUM hUM hUM/ 
<p>5a.6</p>badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha rod adz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT ces bya ba'i sngags 'dis phyogs thams cad du brdeg par bya'o/ /slar yang bgegs thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i ched du rang rang gi phyogs su son pa'i dpung dang bu dang chung mar bcas pa'i dbang po la sogs
<p>5a.7</p>pa rnams bzhengs par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag khang gi dbus sam/ dbang ldan du gcig tu gnas par bltas la/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba stong khro bo smad mdung gi rnam pas sngags de nyid kyi blos phur bu gdab par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor bgegs med par rnam
<p>5b</p>
<p>5b.1</p>bar bsgoms nas sgrub pa'i grogs dang lhan cig tu rdo rje khu tshur gyis thig skud bzung nas g.yas skor du 'khor bas thig gdab pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon me'i mtshams nas byang du kha bltas te/ sgrub pa'i grogs dbang ldan nas lho ru mngon par phyogs pas shar gyi thig
<p>5b.2</p>gdab par bya'o/ /de nas rlung gi mtshams su song ste lho ru mngon par phyogs pa dang / srin po'i mtshams nas byang du bltas pas nub kyi cha thig gdab par bya'o/ /slar yang g.yas skor gyis rlung gi mtshams su song ste dbang ldan du gnas pa dang byang gi cha thig gdab par bya'o/ /de
<p>5b.3</p>bzhin me'i mtshams su song nas srin por 'dug pa dang / lho'i cha thig gdab po/ /de'i tshe yang sngags pas dge mi dge'i mtshan ma brtag par bya ste/ de tshe gal te dge slong ngam/ /bram ze mnyam gzhag 'ongs pa na/ /sbyin bdag la ni dge ba ste/ /zhi dang rgyas pa
<p>5b.4</p>chen po byed/ /mkhas pa 'ongs par gyur pa na/ /rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa ston/ /gal te ba lang 'ongs pa na/ /bu dang bu mo sogs 'thob/ /bum pa gang ba 'ongs na ni/ /nor dang so ba la sogs 'phel/ /rgyal po 'am ni rgyal rigs 'ongs/ /ba lang ma he
<p>5b.5</p>la sogs rnyed/ /gal te dga' byed gzugs ldan ma/ /'ongs na dpal ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /me tog la sogs 'ongs na ni/ /grags pa yang dag 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sgur po mi'u thung rdum po sogs/ /yan lag dman dang mtha' skyes dag /de tshe der ni 'ongs
<p>5b.6</p>pa na/ /dge legs byed 'gyur the tshom med/ /gtor zan bya rgod kang ka sogs/ /dur khrod bya ni gal te ni/ /steng gi nam mkhar rgyu ba na/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba nyid yin no/ /don rig pa yis thig 'debs tshe/ /de phyir brtag par bya ba ste/ /mi dge'i rtags ni byung ba na/ / 
<p>5b.7</p>mkhas pas thig ni bshol bar bya/ /gang du las kyis bskul ba yis/ /gal te thig ni 'gom pa na/ /'og na de yi rigs kyi ni/ /rus pa yod par mkhas pas bshad/ /gzhan yang cho ga ji bzhin du/ /blo ldan rdo du ma de ni gdon/ /gal te rdo de ma bton na/ /nyes pa
<p>6a</p>
<p>6a.1</p>skyed par 'gyur ba yin/ /rus pa'i zug rngus lus ni mdzes byed cing / /sol ba'i zug rngus me yi 'jigs pa skyed/ /thal bas nor brlag mi yi rus pas 'chi/ /sbrul sogs zug rngus sna tshogs nad la sogs/ /rdo brdul dang bye ma sen mo skra dang
<p>6a.2</p>pags pa dang / /shing dang pha gu bshang ba phub ma lcags dang chor ma sogs/ /zug rngu rnams kyis bcing dang brdeg sogs rnam pa mang po yi/ /nyon mongs rnams skyed de phyir zug rngu chung yang brtags te gzhom/ /de nas las kyi rdo rje yis/ /rtsig pa'i rmang ni rim pa bzhin/ / 
<p>6a.3</p>gzhi bdag klu ni legs brtags te/ /tho rangs bsod nams 'phel phyir brko/ /mon gre tha skar smin drug zla ba dang / /nyi ma'i 'gros kyis dbang po'i phyogs su mgo / gshin rjer kha bltas klu ni nyal 'gyur te/ /thams cad du yang g.yon pa phab nas so/ /mgo dang
<p>6a.4</p>rgyal mchu rnams la mgo bo ni/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su ston pa kho na ste/ nub tu kha bltas lus kyi dang po ni/ /mi yi cha byad ro smad sbrul dang 'dra/ /dbo dang nag pa sa ga'i zla ba la/ /byang gi phyogs su kha ni bltas gyur te/ /stobs chen sa gzhi bzhi ni bdag po'i klu/ /sngas
<p>6a.5</p>ni nub kyi phyogs su bstan te nyal/ /snron dang chu stod byi bzhin rnams la ni/ /klu ni gzhogs kyis nyal bar byed pa ste/ /chur ni mgo bo bstan te shar phyogs su/ /kha bltas gzhi ni thams cad non par ro/ /kun du gal te klu 'di yis/ /snying ga'i mdun du brkos pa na/ /sbyin
<p>6a.6</p>bdag gi ni 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub 'byung bar the tshom med/ /gal te mgo bor brkos na ni/ /pha ma snying grogs rtsa lag dang / /bu dang bu mo la sogs rnams/ /nges par brlag par 'gyur ba yin/ /gal te rgyab tu brkos na ni/ /gnas nyams dga' ba'am
<p>6a.7</p>yang na 'chi/ /mjug ma'i cha yis myur du yang / /ba lang ma he sogs brlag 'gyur/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin g.yas skor gyis snying ga'i mdun du brkos nas/ zug rngu thams cad kyang rnam par skyangs te slob dpon gyis g.yas skor du rim pa bzhin du kun nas grags pa
<p>6b</p>
<p>6b.1</p>dang ldan pa'i gnas brtag par bya'o/ /de nas yon bdag dang / sa dang gnas kyi lha dang phyogs skyong dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / zhing skyong dang / mi'i bdag po la sogs pa'i zhi ba'i don du dgongs mo zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas gtor ma gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas tshes grangs
<p>6b.2</p>bzang po la yon bdag gi rjes su mthun pa'i gza' dang rgyu skar dang dus sbyor dang yud tsam la/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs thams cad du ba dan dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po dang sngon po dang dud mdog dang tshon sna tshogs dang ser po dang ljang gu rnams btsugs te sa gzhir me tog dri zhim
<p>6b.3</p>po gcal bkram nas/ dri zhim po'i spos khang mang po bkod de/ shin tu gsal ba'i mar me'i phreng ba'i tshogs rnams dang / /dri chu zhim pos bsangs te dam pa'i chos bklag pa dang / bstod pa dang / bkra shis dang glu dang tuR+Ya'i sgra dang bud med bzang mo rnams kyi ca co dang gzha'i
<p>6b.4</p>sgra dang bcas pas phyogs kyi tshogs nas sa gzhi der byed du bcug nas ltad mo ba'i skye bo rnams mgu bar bya'o/ /de nas sbyin bdag dang gzhan dag gi yang rgyas pa'i don du sngags pa gos bzang po dang rgyan dang cod pan dang / yo byad yongs su tshang bas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas yon bdag gis
<p>6b.5</p>kyang de'i tshe gal te nus na rgyal po dbang por byas nas de'i bka' yang thog mar byas te/ rtsig mkhan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas gos la sogs pa'i sbyin pas yongs su mgu bar byas te/ pha gu 'dzeg tu gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la dga' ba'i yid kyis rang gi 'byor pa dang mthun
<p>6b.6</p>pas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bu mo dang / glang po dang rta dang ba lang dang ma he la sogs pa'i nor dang / gser dang dngul dang zangs dang nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang / rgyan dang gos bzang po rnams dang / me tog yongs su rgyas pa'i zhing / khang khyim
<p>6b.7</p>dang / kun dga' ra ba la sogs pa'i gnas dang / bran pho dang / bran mo la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa'i phyir thams cad kyis slob dpon mnyes par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la slob dpon gyis bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas yang dag par
<p>7a</p>
<p>7a.1</p>mchod de bstod pa byas nas bdud rtsi myang ba byas te yi ge brgya pa lan bdun brjod nas phyag byas te/ bzod pa gsol nas sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas yon bdag slob dpon gyi mdun du byas te rang
<p>7a.2</p>gi khyim du song nas dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa rnams la chos ston drangs te yon yang phul nas slar gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / rtsig mkhan dang las byed rnams dang / gzhan dag
<p>7a.3</p>la yang ston mo byin nas nus pa dang mthun par phul te bzod pa gsol nas slar gtang ngo / /mtshan mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo byas nas phyogs skyong la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma phul te/ thams cad nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /gtsug lag khang gi ar+g+ha'i cho ga'o// //de bzhin du
<p>7a.4</p>mchod rten dang / gzhal med khang khyams kyi ar+g+ha yang rig par bya'o/ /gtsug lag khang sogs zhig ral rnying / /'chos par 'dod na sngags pa yis/ /gtor ma la sogs byin nas ni/ /der gnas lha ni spo bar bya/ /phyi nas snying rje'i bdag can gyis/ /rim pa
<p>7a.5</p>bzhin du bcos nas ni/ /rdzogs par mthong nas spros pa de/ /der ni snga ma bzhin du gzhag /ces bya ba ni gtsug lag khang la sogs pa rnying pa dang zhig ral gyi ar+g+ha'i cho ga'o// //de nas ras ris la sogs pa brtsam par 'dod pa'i sngags pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ zhi
<p>7a.6</p>ba'i gtor ma btang nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag par mos par byas te/ brtsams pa'i lha'am rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas nas de nas nam mkhar sangs rgyas la sogs pa mngon par bltas te/ snyim pa'i me tog gtor nas phyag byas te cho ga bzhin lhag
<p>7a.7</p>par gnas par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gos gtsang ma 'am/ /shing la sogs pa rnams la ji lta bar rang gi lha'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las phyag mtshan sa bon gyis mtshan pa de yongs su gyur pa las zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang
<p>7b</p>
<p>7b.1</p>gdan dang 'od can thugs kar mtshan ma dang sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ snying ga dang spyi bo dang lkog mar yi ge hUM dang oM dang AH/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa la rigs dang mthun pa'i cod pan can snyoms par zhugs pa skad cig mas grub pa'i lha rnam par bsgoms nas
<p>7b.2</p>mchod pa lnga yis mchod de bstod pa bya ba'o/ /de nas bzo byed rnams bgegs mthar byed kyi gzugs can la lus dang ngag dang yid la phyag mtshan dang sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam par bsams nas de'i lag pa g.yon dang g.yas dag zla ba rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs
<p>7b.3</p>la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du pir dang tshon la sogs pa bsngags te shes rab kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsir rnam par bsgoms nas slar yang yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis brtan par byas te gtad nas rtsom du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas bsang gtor la
<p>7b.4</p>sogs pa phul te legs par mchod de bstod pa byas nas bdud rtsi myang ba byas te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas phyogs skyong ba rnams la gtor ma btang nas slob dpon dang las byed dang gzhan dag kyang ston mo byin te nus pa bzhin yon
<p>7b.5</p>phul nas gtang bar bya'o/ /ras ris la sogs pa'i ar+g+ha'i cho ga'o// //dam chos glegs bam rtsom pa yis/ /cho ga de bzhin byas nas ni/ /shog bu la ni d+hi las byung / /shes rab pha rol phyin bltas nas/ /de yongs gyur las byung ba yi/ /yi ge'i
<p>7b.6</p>phreng ni blta bar bya/ /snag tsha smyu gu yongs bzlas te/ /brtsam par bya ba nyid yin no/ /de dag la bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ /oM d+hi su ti smr-i ti ma ti bi dza ye sar+tha adz+nyA na pa Ta lA pa ha ri Ni hri swA hA/ slob dpon dang ni 'dri mkhan la 'ang / /ston mo drangs nas nan tan gyis/ /yon
<p>7b.7</p>phul nas ni gtang bya ste/ /lhag pa sngar bzhin rig par bya/ /gsang sngags kyi glegs bam rtsom pa na yang snga ma bzhin thams cad bya ste/ shog bu la sa bon dang phyag mtshan gyi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i 'od dpag med yongs su gyur pa bris pa'i yi ge'i tshogs
<p>8a</p>
<p>8a.1</p>kyis dkrigs par rnam par bsgom mo/ /lhag ma ni thang ka rtsom pa'i cho ga bzhin bsgrub par bya'o/ /yang na ni dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam yang cho ga 'di nyid kyis bya'o/ /gsung rab kyi ar+g+ha'i cho ga'o// //de nas gtor ma gtong ba yi/ /yo byad cho gas phul
<p>8a.2</p>nas ni/ /sngags pas lhag gnas byas nas su/ /bsang gtor la sogs byin nas ni/ /der ni chu lha'i gzugs can du/ /rnam par snang mdzad blta bar bya/ /sbrul zhags ral gri rin chen dang / /chu skyes shes rab snyoms 'jug dkar/ /yi ge oM la sogs pa dang / / 
<p>8a.3</p>badzra ba ru Na hUM zhes brjod/ /de yongs gyur las byung ba yi/ /rigs brgyad klu yi pho brang ni/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i chus gang ba/ /zhi ba'i klu yis byin gyis brlabs/ /dngos kun gyis ni rnam bsams nas/ /slar yang gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya'o/ / 
<p>8a.4</p>sa 'og mthar thug yan lag ni/ /brgyad ldan chu yis yongs gang ba/ /chu yi rgyun ni blta bya ste/ /gzhan ni thams cad snga ma bzhin/ /zhes bya ba ni rdzing bu dang wa chu dang khron pa la sogs pa'i ar+g+ha'i cho ga'o// //cho ga bzhin du mchod pa dang / /lhag gnas sngar bzhin
<p>8a.5</p>byas nas ni/ /nang gi sa yi sbyang ba ni/ /rim bzhin dag par bya ba ste/ /blo ldan mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /gsang sngags brjod de byin gyis brlab/ /rol mo'i gnas ni nyams dga' bar/ /sangs rgyas la sogs bsgom bya ste/ /de nas sbyin sreg kyang ni btab/ / 
<p>8a.6</p>sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin/ /gzhan yang lha rnams thams cad la/ /mkhyen bya de nas bzod par gsol/ /rdzogs sangs lha mo de sras dang / /tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs kyis gang / /cho ga ma tshang bzod mdzad rigs/ /thams cad du yang sbyin bdag ni/ / 
<p>8a.7</p>zhi dang rgyas chen mdzad nas kyang / /slar yang 'byon par mdzad slad du/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /thams cad du bzod pa gsol ba dang gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /yang na/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos
<p>8b</p>
<p>8b.1</p>grub stsol/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra muH /zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /kun dga' ra ba dang rol mo'i de'u dang ldum ra'i sbyin pa'i sa gzhi'i ar+g+ha'i cho ga'o// //dpal ldan gsang
<p>8b.2</p>'dus gsung ba yi/ /cho ga gang zhig ma tshang ba/ /spyi rgyud gsungs pa'i cho ga la/ /brten nas de ni bskangs pa yin/ /dpal ldan zhi ba bzang po'i zhabs kyi sprin las byung / /man ngag chu rgyun dri med phun tshogs thob pa yis/ /snang byed zla ba'i sa gzhi la ni gang
<p>8b.3</p>skyes pa'i/ /'dus pa'i ar+g+ha'i cho ga'i lo tog 'gro la bsngo/ /nyon mongs 'phrog byed ar+g+ha'i cho ga byas pa las/ /bdag la rnam dag bsod nams skyes pa gang gyur pa/ /de yis 'gro ba ma lus rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /sems can gyi ni dgongs pa mdzad pa nyid du shog/ / 
<p>8b.4</p>ar+g+ha'i cho ga snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba ren+d+ra ba'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrtis bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ 
<p>8b.5</p>rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyes pa'i dra ba mtha' dag rnam par bsal zhing dri med ye shes snang bas mdzes/ /sangs rgyas sku yi tshogs ni rtag tu sprul pas 'gro ba'i don ni phun tshogs mdzad/ /kun dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsal
<p>8b.6</p>rig ma dam pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje 'dzin de btud nas 'dus pa'i gzhung du rab gnas cho ga bdag gis rab tu bshad/ /rab gnas mkha' dbyings mnyam nyid rjes 'brel ba/ /bde gshegs glegs bam rdo dril chos de bzhin/ /'jig rten don dam ma rtogs de yi phyir/ / 
<p>8b.7</p>'jig rten phan phyir mgon pos rab gnas mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags/ /stang stabs stan dang sbyin sreg bzlas/ /mchod pa'i las kyi sbyor ba dang / /bsdu ba zhes bya de nyid bcu/ /slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing / /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ / 
<p>9a</p>
<p>9a.1</p>mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /bstan bcos kun gyi don la mkhas/ /bla ma las ni dbang kun thob/ /rjes su gnang ba'i yon tan can/ /brtan po dam tshig sdom par ldan/ /theg pa gsum gyi dgongs pa shes/ /sku gzugs mchod rten gtsug lag
<p>9a.2</p>khang / /dam chos ras ris glegs bam rnams/ /bzang po tshad kyis mdzes pa dang / rdzogs pa bde ba'i rgyu rnams la/ /de shes mtshan nyid rtogs pa yis/ /rab gnas bya bar 'os pa ste/ /rjes su yi rang byed pa dang / /yon bdag bsod nams spel phyir ro/ /nam
<p>9a.3</p>yang rab gnas dman pa ni/ /cho ga nyams pas mi bya ste/ /'jig rten 'di ru sdug bsngal che/ /'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa che/ /de phyir dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /thams cad la yang nan tan bya/ /rtog pa las byung de bzhin du/ /rang nyid kyi ni nus pas bsgrub/ / 
<p>9a.4</p>de ltar byas na bsod nams che/ /mthong dang ma mthong skye bar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags bzang pos lha rnams ni/ /bzhugs par 'gyur ba nyid yin no/ /gang du sku gzugs zin pa ni/ /yun ring mchod pa ma byas bzhugs/ /yon bdag la ni mi shis 'byung / / 
<p>9a.5</p>ji srid rab gnas ma byas par/ /dper na skyes bu la la zhig /rigs dang mtshan nyid bral ba la/ /'jig rten kun gyis mchod bya min/ /de bzhin du yang gzugs brnyan no/ /gang zhig rab gnas ma byas la/ /phyag dang mchod pa gang zhig dang / /gsang sngags
<p>9a.6</p>dman pas bsreg rdzas bzhin/ /'bras med sbyin sreg thal bar zad/ /de bzhin gsang sngags med par ni/ /chos gnas mchod pa byed pa yang / /las de yi ni rnam smin gyis/ /skye ba kun du mi mchod 'gyur/ /de la thog ma nyid du rang nyid bsod nams 'dod
<p>9a.7</p>pas sam/ /slob mas gsol ba btab pas rab gnas rtsol ba na/ re zhig sngon du bsnyen pa bya ste/ de la ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags dang rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sngags 'bum du bzlas par bya'o/ /gzhan dag gi sngags khri bzla
<p>9b</p>
<p>9b.1</p>bar bya'o/ /yang na bdag po'i bkas sam lhag par mos pas rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe slob mas maN+Dal sngon du song bas lan gnyis sam gsum mchog tu gsol ba btab pa de'i tshe/ /slob dpon gyis yo byad 'tshogs sam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /de na re cung zad
<p>9b.2</p>ni 'tshogs la cung zad ni ma 'tshogs so zhes zer na/ de'i tshe yang slob ma'i lte bar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis snying gar gnas pa kaM yig yongs su gyur pa las byung ba nag po'i rnam par gyur ba'i rlig pa 'phyang ba sha za lta bu'i sdig pa sna'i rtse mor 'thon pa
<p>9b.3</p>dang / yi ge hUM de yang snying gar 'thon pas g.yon brkyang ba mche ba gtsigs pa gsus pa 'phyang ba sku mdog nag po phyag g.yon snying gar sdigs mdzub dang mche ba can/ phyag g.yas mche ba gdengs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin khro ba'i gzugs can du byas nas 'thon pas/ oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da
<p>9b.4</p>khA da pA pa n+ya s+ya hUM phaT ces bya bas sdig pa 'di zar bcug nas slob ma de yang saM yig las kun du bzang po'i gzugs su rnam par bsams te/ de'i sems kyi bgegs rnams bdud rtsi 'khyil pas phur bus btab ste phur bu'i 'od zer shin tu drag pa 'jigs pa rnams kyis gdug
<p>9b.5</p>pa thams cad nges par bsregs nas/ slob ma'i snying gar bsrung ba'i don du yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs tha ma pa las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas sngags pas stegs bu rnying pa'am/ mchod rten
<p>9b.6</p>gyi gzhi 'am lha'i rigs kyi khang pa la sogs pa yongs su brtags pa'i sa gzhi yod par phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyis sbyang ba dang gzung ba dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje gur dang ra ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / lhag par gnas
<p>9b.7</p>ba dang thig gdab pa dang rdul tshon dgye ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa las bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas sngags pas yongs su brtags shing shin tu 'jam pa'i sa phyogs su stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ mdun du bsang gtor la sogs pa'i snod bzhag nas
<p>10a</p>
<p>10a.1</p>dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byas te/ ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bum pa rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de la rtsa ba dang nag po med pa mchu 'phyang ba mgrin pa ring ba lto ba che ba nas dang gro dang ma sha dang 'bras so ba dang til rnams
<p>10a.2</p>te 'bru lnga dang / br-i ha sti dang kaN+Da ka ri dang a pa ra dzi ta dkar po dang ha sa dang ha sa de ba rnams te sman lnga dang / gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang byi ru dang mu men rnams te rin po che lnga dang / gur gum dang gla rtsi dang si h+la dang tsan+dan dang ga bur rnams te dri lnga dang ldan pa/ bsti
<p>10a.3</p>gnas kyi chus gang ba/ 'dzam bu dang ka pid+tha dang ma du lung ga dang shrI pha la ste yal ga lngas kha brgyan pa/ gos sar pa zung gis mgul pa dkris pa/ chos 'byung la gnas pa'i rang gi lha'i mtshan mas mtshan pa la yi ge baM las rin po che'i rang bzhin las byas par
<p>10a.4</p>bsams nas gdugs dang bcas pa rjes su mthun pa'i gdan la bzhag pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo bsgoms nas me tog gi phreng bas dkris pa'i rdo rje bum pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dang
<p>10a.5</p>'brel ba'i phreng ba'i rtse mo nas bzung ste/ yi ge gsum dang spel ba'i rang gi lha'i sngags kyis a d+hi tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba des brgya rtsa brgyad du de la mngon par bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas ar+g+ha la sogs pa phul te mchod pa lngas mchod nas/ dril bu dkrol bzhin pas mngon par bstod
<p>10a.6</p>par bya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang dkyil 'khor pa'i bum pa rnams ni cung zad chung ba rjes su mthun pa'i gdan la bzhag pa rnams la dri'i chu yis bkang ste/ 'dzam bu dang tsu ta la sogs pa'i yal gas kha brgyan pa sman lnga la sogs pa dang ldan pa mgrin pa gos kyis dkris pa rang
<p>10a.7</p>gi lha'i mtshan ma gdugs dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor pa'i lha bsgoms pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags yi ge gsum dang spel bas tha mar a d+hi tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba dang / lan bdun bdun bzla bar bya'o/ /'gro ba kun bsang ba'i don du bum pa
<p>10b</p>
<p>10b.1</p>gzhan du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgoms nas/ oM a big+h+nAM ta kr-ita hUM a d+hi tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ar+g+ha la sogs pa phul nas yang dag par mchod de/ bstod pa bya'o/ /bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du phyogs skyong rnams la de'i
<p>10b.2</p>sngags kyis gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /de la 'di ltar bum pa lhag par gnas pa nyi ma re re zhing thun gsum gsum du bya'o/ /bum pa mdor bsdu ba'i phyogs la ni rigs kyi yum bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang rang gi rigs dang bcas pa lnga dang / las thams cad
<p>10b.3</p>pa'i bum pa dang bcur brtag par bya'o/ /rdul tshon dgye ba bum pa dgod par bya'o/ /de la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni gtso bo'i g.yas phyogs su'am dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor ba'i bum pa rnams ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi zur bzhir
<p>10b.4</p>dgod par bya'o/ /las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i rtsa ba'i sgo'i g.yas phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas bum pa de rnams las chu nyung zad nyung zad blangs te bdud rtsi lnga'i snod du blugs nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/ / 
<p>10b.5</p>de ltar byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyis gzhi nye bar byugs par gyen du bsgreng ba'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / bla re phub pa'i mtha' ma rnams nas rnga yab dkar po dbyangs te/ dri zhim po'i me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram nas dum bu dang bsdus pa la sogs
<p>10b.6</p>pa'i spos dud gtul te/ si h+la dang / ga pur dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / tsan+dan dang 'dres pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pas chag chag btab pa'i sa'i char pi wang dang / gling bu dang rnga zlum dal ba dang / glu dang gar gyi dga' ston dang / gru bzhi sgo
<p>10b.7</p>bzhi rta babs bzhis brgyan cing bum pa gang bas brgyan pa'i gnas su gza' dang rgyu skar dang / dus sbyor bzang po 'dzom pa'i nyin zhag bzang po la khrus dang gtsang sbra byas te gos dang rgyan bzang po dbu rgyan me tog dang bcas pas grogs bzang po dang lag pa rdo rje dang dril bu
<p>11a</p>
<p>11a.1</p>'dzin pas stan thog mthon po 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ mdun du bsang gtor la sogs pa'i snod bzhag nas dkyil 'khor mchod de ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i sngags pas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs las gsungs pa bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya'o/ / 
<p>11a.2</p>de nas mngon du phyogs pa'i lha rnams kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ rjes su mthun pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang gdan la snyoms par zhugs pa/ rten dang brten par bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor sa bon dang phyag mtshan gyis thugs kar byin gyis brlabs pa/ 
<p>11a.3</p>rigs dang mthun pa'i cod pan gyi lha rnams skad cig mas bltas la/ nam mkha' la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdor bsdus pa'i gzugs dkyil 'khor bas yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po mngon par bltas la
<p>11a.4</p>bsang gtor la sogs pa phul te/ rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas bstod pa byas te bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/ /de nas dri zhim po'i me tog gi snyim pas lus btud de/ oM sarba
<p>11a.5</p>ta thA ga ta pa ra ma su khA sha ya su la li ta/ bi lA senA mi tairnA mA mi b+ha ga wAn+taM dzaHhUM baM hoHpra tIts+tsha ku su ma any+dza li nA tha ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas snyim pa'i me tog dor bar bya'o/ /de nas pus mo g.yas pa sa la btsugs te/ lag pa g.yas pas spos dud bskyod pas
<p>11a.6</p>bdag po de dag gzhan dag kyang snyan gsan dbab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mchog /rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mgon po bdag ni rab gnas dag /dgyid par 'tshal gyi thugs rje can/ /slob ma rnams la phan pa dang / /khyed rnams la
<p>11a.7</p>yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan gus pa bdag la ni/ /rjes su gzung bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad dag /dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa las/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhum gshegs ltar/ /de bzhin gnas 'dir bzhugs su
<p>11b</p>
<p>11b.1</p>gsol/ /'dir ni rtag tu bzhugs nas kyang / /me tog la sogs mchod pa rnams/ /byang chub sems ni 'phel ba'i phyir/ /che ge'i don du bzhes su gsol/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo'i don mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /'bras gnas byang
<p>11b.2</p>chub sems dpa' dang / /gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / /'byung po sangs rgyas bstan gnas dang / /bstan la mngon dga'i sems can rnams/ /gang zhig rdo rje'i mig can yang / /rdo rje can bdag che ge mo/ / 
<p>11b.3</p>rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /nye bar spyod pa ci nus kyis/ /'gro ba dag phyir bgyid par 'tshal/ /rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs te/ /slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni/ /'di dag lhan cig thams cad kyis/ /nye ba nyid du mdzad pa'i rigs/ /de ltar lan gsum
<p>11b.4</p>du snyan gsan phab nas snga ma bzhin yang dag par mchod de bstod nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/ /de ltar lha snyan gsan dbab pa byas nas bdag nyid gzengs bstod par bya ste/ deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis
<p>11b.5</p>mnyam par/ /gyur par bdag ni the tshom med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig las/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skyes par the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ / 
<p>11b.6</p>sangs rgyas thams cad snyan mnan pas/ /di ring bdag ni nye bar gyur/ /de'i rjes la slob dpon gyis sgrub grogs yod na dkyil 'khor gyi sar bzhag la phyi rol du byung ste/ /bdag po 'am khro bo'i rnal 'byor gyis bza' btung dang nya sha dang 'bras mar gyi spod dang til dang snum
<p>11b.7</p>khur zlum po la sogs pa'i gtor ma man ngag ji lta ba bzhin sbyangs te/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang po la sogs pa bkug nas so so'i phyogs kyi sgo nyid du bsang gtor dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa byin nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod de khur gyis sam/ 
<p>12a</p>
<p>12a.1</p>snyim pas lan gsum du sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas zhal bsil la sogs pa phul te yang dag par mchod nas slar gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas nang du zhugs te bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bzlas pa'i skud pa sum dkris su mdud pa gsum gyis dpung pa g.yas par
<p>12a.2</p>bcings te/ las thams cad pa'i chus g.yas g.yon du bsangs te slob ma bsrung ba'o/ /phrin las 'di dag thams cad legs par bskul ba byas pa'i slob ma dang lhan cig spyad par bya'o/ /de dag la yang 'di bsgo bar bya ste/ gsang sngags gang cung zad cig smra/ / 
<p>12a.3</p>mchod sogs cho ga de bya ste/ /mchod sbyin 'bras bu che 'byung la/ /sgyu yis bya ba ma yin nyid/ /de nas bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags ji srid 'dod par bzlas te nyal bar bya'o/ /'di ni lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas phyi de nyin par tho rangs kyi
<p>12a.4</p>dus su ji skad bstan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / yo byad thams cad 'tshogs pa'i sngags pas zhi ba'i gtor ma btang nas lha la mngon du phyogs te lha'i rnal 'byor byas pas sku gzugs zhal shar du gzigs pa na bza' ser pos dkris pa la sngar bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can du
<p>12a.5</p>rnal 'byor gyis bskyed pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i snying ga dang / spyi bo dang / lkog mar hUM oM AH/ /zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa stegs bu'i steng du 'dug stan gtsang ma la bzhag nas dri ma sel ba rnams kyis dri ma bsal bar bya'o/ /de la khu
<p>12a.6</p>tshur g.yas g.yon gyis bzung ba'i yungs kar dang chu dang zan lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs las bzlog pas bskor zhing oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum mer blugs par bya'o/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes
<p>12a.7</p>bya ba lan bdun du bzlas pa'i dri zhim po'i mar khus ku sha'i tshom bu bzang po byugs nas khar ba'i snod du bzhag pa'i ba Ta dang u dum+WA ra dang / a shwad+tha dang / shri Sha dang / blag sha'i shun pa brdungs pas brud nas sa bon lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang 'dres
<p>12b</p>
<p>12b.1</p>pa'i ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o/ /phyi nas rgyal po dbang bskur ba'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa'i mi dang bcas pas rgyal ba dang bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad ba rnams kyis bstod bzhin pa dang / tuR+Ya'i sgra dang bud med rnams kyi ca co'i sgra rnams dang / nye bar mtshon pa'i dbang bskur
<p>12b.2</p>ba'i cho gas spyan la sogs pa'i phyag gis bzung ba'i bum pa ye shes kyi chus gang ba rnams kyis dbang bskur bar lhag par mos pas khrus kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod bzhin pas bum pa'i chus khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de la khrus kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam
<p>12b.3</p>gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol pa/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ye shrI hUM/ po ti dang thang sku la sogs pa rnams la ni lhag par mos pas me long la khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de la dbang bskur
<p>12b.4</p>ba'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ dang po ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pas so/ /de nas rnam snang la sogs pa'i bum pas so/ /de nas ni spyan la sogs pa'i bum pas so/ /de nas ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i bum pas so/ /de nas ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i bum pas so/ /de
<p>12b.5</p>nas ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i bum pas so/ /de'i tshe yang bkra shis kyi glu blang bar bya'o/ /bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni/ /bkra shis gang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku/ /gcig nyid dang ni du ma nyid kyang rnam spangs pa'i/ /ma gos gzugs med rdul dang
<p>12b.6</p>bral ba gang yin pa'i/ /bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog /bkra shis gang zhig sangs rgyas sras kyis yongs bskor zhing / /longs spyod rdzogs sku dam chos kyi ni gsungs dang bcas/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su brgyan gyur pa/ /bkra shis
<p>12b.7</p>de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog /bkra shis gang zhig nags kyi me ni mched pa ltar/ /'jug dang 'bar dang yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yis/ /sprul pa'i sku mchog gzhan gyi don ni mdzad pa'o/ /bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog /bkra shis
<p>13a</p>
<p>13a.1</p>gang zhig sems can kun la phan byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag blo ldan nyes pa'i tshogs dang bral/ /shes rab yan lag 'dus pas mdzes pa'i bde ba'i bdag /bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni dbang mchog bskur/ /bkra shis gang zhig lha dang lha min
<p>13a.2</p>mis mchod pa/ /de yis bstan pa'i dam chos bla na med pa ni/ /bdag med 'jig rten gsum las rab tu grags pa yi/ /bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la yang dbang mchog bskur/ /bkra shis gang zhig rab mchog dam chos rtag tu 'dzin/ /bzang po'i sar bzhugs sangs rgyas
<p>13a.3</p>sras po'i tshogs kyi mchog /rnam pa kun du sems can don mdzad bkra shis bzang / /bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni dbang mchog bskur/ /de ltar rim pa bzhin du khrus gsol nas/ de nas gos dkar po srab mos phyis te gur kum gyi lde gus byugs pa la na bza'
<p>13a.4</p>dkar po zung gcig /oM di bya bA sa se swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis yongs su gsol bar bya'o/ /oM AHbadzra gan+d+he hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ga bur dang gla rtsi dang gur gum la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyis mnyam par byugs nas gal te yod na/ oM badzra A ba ra Na
<p>13a.5</p>bi b+hu Sha Ne swa hA/ zhes bya bas spyan dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas go ro tsa na'i thig le byas te me tog dang bdug spos dang / mar me tam+bo la yang phul nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis kun du bsrungs te/ dkyil 'khor la yang hUM yig gis bteg nas Tak+ki'i sngags la a
<p>13a.6</p>khaM bI ra hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbus su gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas yod na phyi rol gyi rig ma de med na bsgom pa dang lhan cig bsam gtan gyis gnas te/ pad+ma dang rdo rje'i sgras bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi snying gar bcug nas
<p>13a.7</p>zhu bar byas te rang gi rdo rje go cha'i lam nas shes rab kyi pad+ma'i nang du lhung bar gyur pa dang / shes rab kyi ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas 'od zer du gyur nas 'thon pa dang / nam mkha' khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par blos nye bar bzhag ste/ bsang gtor
<p>13b</p>
<p>13b.1</p>dang zhal bsil la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ga nas spros pa'i 'phags pa gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyis de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i bgegs kyi rigs bkug bskrad nas de rnams nyid dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya bas dgug pa

<p>13b.3</p>dang de bzhin thang las skyes/ /me tog dam pa 'di dag ni/ /bdag gis gus pas phul bas na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM AHbadzra puSh+pe hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis me tog dbul bar bya'o/ /lhan skyes de bzhin sbyar ba yi/ /bdug spos dam pa 'di dag ni/ /

<p>13b.5</p>oM AHbadzra gan+d+he hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dri'o/ /lha rdzas 'bar ba mun pa 'joms/ /snum ldan sgron ma 'di dag ni/ /rab tu dang bas 'bul lags na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM AHbadzra dI pe hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis sgron ma'o/ /zhal zas rnam
<p>13b.6</p>kun yang dag ldan/ /bza' dang ston mor bcas pa 'di/ /kha dog ro dang drir ldan pa/ /dbul lo yang dag bzhes su gsol/ /oM AHbadzra nai bi t+ya hUM zhes bya bas lha bshos so/ /de nas zhal bsil phul te/ me tog gis mchod nas/ mi bskyod rdo rje zhes bya ba
<p>13b.7</p>la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bstod nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/ /de nas thal mo sbyar te lus btud nas sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pas de kho na nyid kyi bden pa bdar bar bya'o/ /nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / 
<p>14a</p>
<p>14a.1</p>sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje che ger bdag grub mdzod/ /dkon mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod/ / 
<p>14a.2</p>'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dkon
<p>14a.3</p>mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas/ /rdo rje snying po bdag por bdag /sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing / /sems can kun gyi yid la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi yab nyid kyang / /dam tshig rtse mo 'dod
<p>14a.4</p>pa'i mchog /bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog /shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor na/ /bden pa de yis mgon bdag po/ /'dod pa yongs su grub par shog /ces bya ba'o/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa lan bdun du bzlas pa bya ste/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya ma nu pA la
<p>14a.5</p>ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Thi dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho b+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH zhes bya ba'o/ /de ltar brtan par byas
<p>14a.6</p>nas sems can don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /mgon po skal ba de bzhin du/ /des ni 'gro don kun du mdzod/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni bzung nas kyang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /zhes so/ /de nas phyi rol du byung ste gtor ma btang nas pad+ma'i snod
<p>14a.7</p>kyi bdud rtsis tshim par byas nas yang dag par mchod de/ phyogs skyong gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob dpon nang du zhugs nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyag 'tshal te/ cho ga ma tshang ba bskang
<p>14b</p>
<p>14b.1</p>ba'i phyir sbyin sreg bya ste/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su 'dug ste byang du mngon par phyogs pa'i sngags pa ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas sbyin sreg gi rab tu byed pa nas bshad pa'i cho ga las thams cad pa'i thab khung du rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi tha mar slob
<p>14b.2</p>ma'i zhi rgyas 'phel bar bya ba'i don du mthe bong lag pa g.yas pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ bsreg rdzas re re zhing lan gsum mam bdun bdun bsreg gam bsreg tu gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma las yon blang bar bya ste/ slob mas kyang dga' ba'i yid
<p>14b.3</p>kyis rang gi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bu mo dang / rta dang glang po dang shing rta dang ba lang dang ma he la sogs pa rnams dang gser dang dngul dang zangs dang nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa'i nor rdzas dang / lo tog yongs su rgyas pa'i zhing sa dang / khyim
<p>14b.4</p>dang kun dga' ra ba dang / ldum ra la sogs pa'i gnas dang / bran pho dang / bran mo la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro/ /slob dpon mnyes pas lha rnams mnyes/ /mnyes pas dngos grub rab stsol 'gyur/ /zhes shes
<p>14b.5</p>par byas la/ rnam pa thams cad du bla ma mnyes par bya'o/ /gal te yod na rgyal po dang sa bdag dang / dge 'dun dang / phyogs skyong dang / bdag nyid kyi'ang zhi rgyas 'phel bar bya ba'i don de bzhin sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o/ /tha mar dgang blugs phul nas zhal bsil
<p>14b.6</p>la sogs pa drangs te mkhyen par gsol te/ bzod pa gsol ba byas nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas zangs su legs par bkrus pa sbyin sreg gi lhag ma'i sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang bu ram dang ka ra la sogs pa bsres pa'i thug pa rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i
<p>14b.7</p>sngags kyis legs par bsgrubs nas/ gser la sogs pa'i snod du blugs te/ oM dI be an+ne sa mA d+hi d+h+yA na prI na ni swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis yongs su bzlas te/ lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dri gtsang khang la sogs pa'i gnas su legs par
<p>15a</p>
<p>15a.1</p>bslabs pa'i bzo bos byas pa sku sum cha'i tshad kyi gdan khri la steng dang 'og tu gzigs pa ma yin par drang bor legs par brtan par byas te/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/ /ma yin na nyes pa 'byung
<p>15a.2</p>bar 'gyur ro/ /snga ma bsang gtor la sogs pa phul te yang dag par mchod nas bstod de bdud rtsi myang ba byas la yi ge brgya ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas te mkhyen par gsol te bzod gsol bya'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sras lha/ /gang zhig tshangs sogs lha yi ni/ / 
<p>15a.3</p>tshogs rnams lha yi bya ba la/ /ma tshang ba ni bzod mdzad rigs/ /kun du zhi dang bde legs dang / /yon bdag don ched mdzad nas ni/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /bskal pa brgya ni brgya yi bar/ /gang gi
<p>15a.4</p>sku gzugs 'di bzhugs pa/ /sa chu me dang rlung gi lha/ /thams cad kyis ni srung bar mdzod/ /rang gnas bde bar gshegs nas ni/ /shin tu dga' gcugs yid kyis ni/ /slob dpon slob mar yang dag ldan/ /bu dang bu mor bcas pa srungs/ /khyad par brjod par bya ste/ 
<p>15a.5</p>bris pa dang brtsigs pa rnams la yang ji skad bshad pa'i tshogs rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de la ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ram/ rab tu gnas par bya ba'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis so/ /rje btsun gyi mchod rten la ni dri gtsang khang bskyed pa'i cho gas bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas
<p>15a.6</p>dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pho brang du bsgoms nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi lha ma lus pa bkug nas mchod rten gyi nang du rab tu gzhug cing / bcings te dbang du byas nas bsang gtor dang / ar+g+ha dang zhabs
<p>15a.7</p>bsil dang dbang bskur dang mchod pa dang bstod pa byas nas bdud rtsi myang ba byas te/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra ye swA hA/ oM hUM hri b+h+ruM tre Tas+tha zhes pa'i sngags kyis rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
<p>15b</p>
<p>15b.1</p>sogs pa ni 'di ltar rab tu gnas par bya ste/ yi ge d+hi yongs su gyur pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser gyi mdog can/ rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang snang gi thabs la 'khyud pa phyag bar ma gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings pa/ phyag tha ma gnyis ni
<p>15b.2</p>mchog sbyin dang po ti bsnams par bsgoms nas/ de yongs su gyur pa'i yi ge'i tshogs rnams kyis dkrigs par glegs bam rnam par bsgoms nas/ oM pradz+nyA shru ti smr-i ti ma ti bi dzA ya swA hA/ d+haM zhes bya bas rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /gsang sngags kyi glegs bam la ni 'od
<p>15b.3</p>dpag med yi ge'i gzugs su gyur par blta ste rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /yang na gsang sngags kyi po ti bzhin du dam chos kyi glegs bam rab tu gnas par byas te/ 'od dpag med kyi rnal 'byor dang sngar bstan pa'i sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje
<p>15b.4</p>'chang rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par rnam par bsgoms te 'di thams cad du'o/ /lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /gtsug lag khang yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi pho brang ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas chos kyi dbyings
<p>15b.5</p>rgya che bar yid kyis bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas oM hUM hrI zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rab tu gnas pa la sogs pa byas te gtor ma mchod pa'i nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa phul nas/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ oM hUM hrIHb+h+rUM khaM bidzrA b+ha ba dr-i D+ho tiSh+Tha b+h+rUM khaM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis
<p>15b.6</p>rab tu gnas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa shin tu brtan par bsgoms nas bum pa thams cad kyi chus gtsug lag khang thams cad du bsang gtor byas te/ oM badzra a b+hiShiny+tsa zhes bya
<p>15b.7</p>ba'i sngags kyis so/ /de nas gtsug lag khang gi srung ma nag po chen po sgrub pa'i thabs nas bshad pa lta bu'i mtshan nyid can yid kyis bkug ste/ ro gcig tu gzhug cing bcings te dbang du byas nas slob dpon rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bka' bsgo bar bya ste
<p>16a</p>
<p>16a.1</p>gtsug lag khang 'di ji srid gnas par khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ste/ sdig pa med pa'i las rnams bya zhing slob dpon dang dge 'dun gyi bya ba thams cad la mchog tu brtson par bya'o/ /de ltar byas nas bla mas slob ma bos te/ gus pa dang bcas pas yang dag
<p>16a.2</p>par smra bar bya ste/ gang khyod kyis gsol ba btab pa'i rab gnas sdig pa 'joms pa de kho bos byas kyi/ ji ltar bde bar nan tan gyis mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas sngags kyis sbyangs pa'i tsA ru de la byin nas 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhag ma sdig pa 'joms pa ste zo cig
<p>16a.3</p>ces so/ /gzhan dag la yang ji ltar thob par nyung ngu nyung ngu sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas yang yon blang ste/ slob mas kyang yon dbul bas bla ma mnyes par byas nas/ mchod pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis lha rnams mchod de bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyag bya'o/ /de nas rang gi
<p>16a.4</p>gnas su song ste dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la ston mo drangs nas yon phul te bzod pa gsol nas slar gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas bzo bo rnams la ston mo byin te gos dang rgyan la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su mgu
<p>16a.5</p>bar byas nas slob dpon gyi rjes su 'brangs pa rnams dang / gzhan gyi yang 'khor rnams gos la sogs pa sbyin pas yongs su mgu bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang nad pa dang mgon med pa rnams kyang nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du mgu bar bya'o/ /mtshan mo nye du dang 'khor rnams la dga' ston
<p>16a.6</p>chen po sbyin par bya ste/ pi wang dang gling bu dang / rnga zlum dang rnga zlum dal ba la sogs pa'i sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa'i glu dang / glu dang rjes su mthun pa'i gar gyis skye bo mngon par dga' ba'i bkra shis dang bstod pa rnams kyis bza' ba dang ston mo dang bldag pa dang / btung ba dang / 
<p>16a.7</p>gzhib pa rnams dang / gos kyi gtam gyis kyang ste nus pa bzhin bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon dga' ston bsdu ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sar bzhugs te yang dag par mchod nas bstod de/ yi ge gsum dang muH'i mtha' can gyis bsdus nas rdul tshon snod gsar par blugs
<p>16b</p>
<p>16b.1</p>te/ don du gnyer ba la nyung ngu byin nas chu bor dor bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang / oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nut+pan+na twAd muHzhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ba'i lci ba byug par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin no/ /rab gnas 'di 'dra byas na ni/ / 
<p>16b.2</p>skye ba 'di dang gzhan du yang / /mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob/ /de bas rtag tu 'di nyid bya/ /sa dong 'gengs dang rab gnas dang / /sbyin sreg 'khor lo'i yo byad gang / /de kun slob dpon nyid dbang zhes/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog gis gsungs/ /rab tu gnas pa'i
<p>16b.3</p>cho ga mchog /'dus pa'i tshul du byas pa las/ /bsod nams bdag skyes gang cung zad/ /des ni 'gro kun rdor 'dzin shog /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal
<p>16b.4</p>ba ren+d+ra pa'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kI rtis bsgyur ba'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /bde ba che la rab
<p>16b.5</p>btud nas/ /bdag 'dra'i blo dman nyid la ni/ /rab gnas cho ga bshad par bya/ /rtsa ba'i yan lag rab gnas la/ /phal cher khrus su 'dod pas na/ /bum pa'i nang du cho ga yis/ /blo dang ldan pas chu bskyed bya/ /mi nag zhabs med mchu 'phyang ba/ /lnga dang bcu dang bcu
<p>16b.6</p>dgu'o/ /lnga po'i rim pa 'di yin te/ /gsang ba 'dus par mngon gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras sogs rnams/ /de rnams phyag mtshan shes par bya/ /de las gzhan pa'i rigs 'di yin/ /sa gnon dang ni byang chub mchog /mchog sbyin bsam gtan
<p>16b.7</p>skyabs sbyin rnams/ /mi bskyod rtag pa rin chen dang / dpag med don yod grub rnams kyi'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bshad rgya/ /byang chub mchog gis bsdus gyur pa'o/ /des na rdo rje gdan sogs kyis/ /mi bskyod sogs kyi rang bzhin no/ /thams cad
<p>17a</p>
<p>17a.1</p>kyis ni po ti bsnams/ /gsung gi rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsal/ /rdo rje chos su rtag tu bya/ /de la sogs pa'i tshig gis kyang / /mchod rten gtsang khang byur bu dang / /mchod rten gyi ni bye brag rnams/ /rtag pa yi ni bdag nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpa' la
<p>17a.2</p>sogs gang / /bya ba'i rgyud la sogs dang mthun/ /'dus pa las gsungs de nyid kyi/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis yang dag bzung / /sgyu 'phrul dra sogs bltas nas ni/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi rigs kyi rim/ /'dus pa'i cho gar bya ba ste/ /slar yang mi shes pa yi rigs/ / 
<p>17a.3</p>rdo rje thugs kyis bzung nas ni/ /phyag mtshan nyid ni yang dag bri/ /gtso bo'i mgrin par bri bar bya/ /logs su bde gshegs bzhi phyag mtshan/ /gcig la cho ga'i rim pas so/ /rdo rje gzugs sogs phyag mtshan ni/ /drug po cig car de bzhin gcig /khro bo
<p>17a.4</p>gsum brtags bgegs dgra gcig /bcu yi phyogs la lha mo bzhi/ /de bzhin phyag mtshan re re la'o/ /khro bo rnams kyang so sor ro/ /lhag ma rnams ni sngar bzhin bri/ /slar yang bcu dgu'i phyogs la ni/ /grangs ni ji bzhin bri bar bya/ /slar yang kha cig nyi shur
<p>17a.5</p>'dod/ /las kun byed pa bsnan pas so/ /me tog dri zhim ldan pa dang / /mgrin pa gos kyis dkris pa dang / /cung zad chu ldan a mrar ldan/ /go rims ji bzhin rnam par gzhag /g.yon du a mra la sogs dgod/ /'dug nas gtor ma yang dag sbyin/ /mu tig
<p>17a.6</p>dngul dang gser zhes grags/ /mu men dang ni byi ru rnams/ /kaN+Da ka ri daN+Dod nyid/ /br-i ha sti dang ka r+Ni ka / nas dang gro dang so ba dang / til dang sran gre'u mngon par brjod/ /'bru lnga dang ni sman lnga dang / /rin chen 'di rnams kyis khengs pa/ /rang gi lha yi gzugs
<p>17a.7</p>kyis ni/ /chu dang ldan par bskyed nas ni/ /kun du nyung ba'i chu blugs nas/ /kham phor rnam rgyal zhes brjod la/ /de ni baM las byung ba yi/ /rin chen rang bzhin bum steng gzhag /rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan gyis bskyed pa'i/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor bdag nyid la/ /ye shes
<p>17b</p>
<p>17b.1</p>dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni/ /zhabs bsil la sogs rim bzhin no/ /dam tshig dang ni lhan cig tu/ /byas nas mnyes bya mchod pa'o/ /me tog spos sogs phyi yis kyang / /rab tu 'bad de yang dag mchod/ /dril bu dkrol bya de yi ni/ /bstod pa byas te bzlas ba bya/ / 
<p>17b.2</p>gcig tu g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcings/ /rdo rje me tog gis bcings nas/ /bum pa chu yis gang ba ni/ /kham phor steng du brtan par gzhag /de nas mchod cing phyag byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin nyid/ /chu yi rang bzhin nyid kyis gzhag /yang na
<p>17b.3</p>bum pa la gzhug bya/ /de ltar 'di dang gzhan rnams kyi/ /thams cad so sor byas nas ni/ /me tog spos sogs sbyin byas nas/ /gtor ma sngon 'gro yang dag bsrung / /'di ni bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /lhag pa'i lha yi sbyor ba las/ /don grub
<p>17b.4</p>chu dang zan rnams kyis/ /lha rnams rdul ni bral bar bya/ /ba yi rnam lnga shing shun lngas/ /byugs te khrus bya mngon bzlas la/ /dri zhim gtsang ma'i chu yis ni/ /bkru bar rung ba rang gzugs kyis/ /ri mo la sogs me long la/ /gang du las la sngags med pa/ / 
<p>17b.5</p>bgegs dgra de ru sbyar bar bya/ /mar nag dri zhim gyis byugs la/ /skyu ru ra yis bkru bar bya/ /ba yi rnam lnga sogs kyis byug /mar nag gis ni byugs pa gang / /bkru bya skyu ru ra yis kyang / /dUr ba'i chun po de 'dod do/ /chu yis bkru bar bya ba ste/ /yang na
<p>17b.6</p>bsgrubs pa'i chu yis kyang / /de la 'di ni mar nag gi sngags te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ /ras 'jam po yis dbyi bar bya/ /ji ltar nus pas gos sogs sbyin/ /ye shes sems dpa'i snying 'od kyis/ /lha rnams bkug nas bzhugs par
<p>17b.7</p>bya/ /sangs rgyas dang gzhan de yi sras/ /bstan pa la ni dga' rnams la'ang / /ku sha'i chun pos bsang gtor bya/ /zhabs bsil sogs kyis de rnams mchod/ /mchod sogs byas nas de rnams la/ /pus mo btsugs te yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje
<p>18a</p>
<p>18a.1</p>dril bu g.yon du 'dzin/ /spos phor g.yas su gzung bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje khyod/ /rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /bdag ni rab gnas bgyi bar 'tshal/ /slob ma la ni brtse don dang / / 
<p>18a.2</p>khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i ched/ /sems can bsod nams 'phel don dang / /byang chub sems ni spel don du/ /bcom ldan bdag la thugs brtse bas/ /bka' drin gyis ni bskyab pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /byang chub sems
<p>18a.3</p>sogs rang bzhin rnams/ /bstan la mngon par dga' ba gzhan/ /gang dag rdo rje'i mig can rnams/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag /rab gnas che ge mo 'di yang / /bdag gis bgyi bas khyed rnams kyis/ /byin gyis brlab ni bgyi bar rigs/ /ting 'dzin
<p>18a.4</p>gsum dang ldan pa yis/ /lugs sku la sogs bskyed par bya/ /'dab ma dang bcas chu yis ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas khrus byas nas/ /mchod pa sngon 'gro de yis ni/ /sngags kyis mngon par bsngags par bya/ /phyag byas mchod pa sogs byas nas/ / 
<p>18a.5</p>slar yang nye bar spyod pa lnga/ /nad par byon par bzhed pa yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /'di ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /nang par sta gon bya ba la/ /rdul bral la sogs byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas la sogs sngar bkug nas/ /zhabs
<p>18a.6</p>bsil byas te mchod par bya/ /spos phor bzung nas pus btsugs te/ /tshigs bcad sngon gsungs brjod par bya/ /bgyi ba'i tshig ni bor nas ni/ /bgyid par 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /ting 'dzin gsum la sbyar byas nas/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsam
<p>18a.7</p>par bya/ /bum pas khrus bya mang po yis/ /bkra shis sgra ni sngon 'gro bas/ /de la 'di ni khrus kyi sngags te/ ji ltar bltams ma thag tu ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/ /lha rdzas chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus
<p>18b</p>
<p>18b.1</p>gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ gos sogs rang rang sngags kyis ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas brtan par bya/ /yang na rang gi sngags kyis sbyin/ /lhag par bzlas nas gtso la 'dud/ /de la 'di rnams ni rang rang gi sngags te/ oM badzra
<p>18b.2</p>bAs se swA hA/ oM badzra d+hU pe swA hA/ oM badzra dI pe hUM/ oM badzra nai bi d+ye hUM/ oM badzra gan+b+he hUM/ oM badzra sarba A ba ra Na bi shod+ha ne swA hA/ snod ni gser gyi rang bzhin nam/ /dngul gyi rang bzhin mnyam bzhag pas/ /bgegs dgra'i sngags kyis yang dag bsgrub/ /mar dang
<p>18b.3</p>sbrang rtsis byugs pa yi/ /gser gyi thur mas mig dbye ste/ /yang na bsam gtan dag gis bya/ /sbyin sreg mes bsgrubs zas kyis ni/ /de ma thag tu gsol bar bya/ /de la 'di ni mig gnyis dbye ba'i sngags te/ oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsuk+Shu bi sho d+ha swA hA/ oM
<p>18b.4</p>dI be an+ne sa mA d+hi d+h+yA na prI na ni swA hA/ 'di ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /dga' ldan gnas su rab bzhugs nas/ lha mo sgyu ma'i lhums zhugs ltar/ /de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol/ /mgon po rtag tu 'dir bzhugs la/ /me tog la sogs
<p>18b.5</p>'di bzhes mdzod/ /che ge mo yi don gyi phyir/ /byang chub sems ni 'phel bar mdzod/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ /smad dang snying ga mgrin pa ru/ /rdo rje gsor bas de rnams la/ /lan gsum bskor nas gzhag par bya/ /lha rnams brtan par 'dod pa yis/ / 
<p>18b.6</p>'chad par 'dod pas tshigs bcad gdon/ /blo gros brtan pas bsam par bya/ /ma tshang lhag pa'i cho ga rnams/ /pus mo btsugs nas bzod par gsol/ /'di ni rab gnas kyi cho ga'o// //de la 'di ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga ste/ g.yon du me tog dkar po dang / /ldan pa'i
<p>18b.7</p>dung sogs chu dang ldan/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha yi bzlas/ /yang na bgegs kyi dgra yi sngags/ /las kun byed pa bzlas nas kyang / /ku sha'i chun po ldan pa yis/ /snod ni de ru gzhag par bya/ /bsang gtor la sogs dgos don du/ /yon chab la sogs sbyin pa'i
<p>19a</p>
<p>19a.1</p>phyir/ /man+dzi la sogs gzhan rnams la/ /g.yas phyogs su ni pa na sha /blag sha dang ni u dum+WA ra/ /tsan+dan arka b+ha tA rnams/ /yal ga be yi kang+ka dang / /a b+ha sa mi gaM b+ha ri/ /a ba marga a shwad+tha/ /byang chub shing las byung ba rnams/ /rlon pa drang
<p>19a.2</p>zhing rtse gcig pa/ /srin bu sogs kyis ma zos pa/ /mthe chung gi ni mtho gang la/ /dri zhim chu yis khrus byas la/ /mar byugs til dang dUr ba bzang / /ma chag pa yi 'bras rnams kyang / /zho zan ku sha so ba dang / /nas dang gro dang mon sren gre/ /sran gre'u 'bras
<p>19a.3</p>yos de bzhin gzhan/ /sbrang rtsi 'o ma la sogs srid/ /rim pa bzhin du bzhag nas ni/ /ting 'dzin gsum dag rnal 'byor pas/ /zhi ba'i gtor ma byin nas ni/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /mtho gang gting du brkos byas nas/ /khru gang 'khor lo
<p>19a.4</p>zlum po la/ /bde gshegs bzhi yi phyag mtshan dang / /bdag po'i phyag mtshan dbus su'o/ /de bzhin dbus su bgegs kyi dgra/ /las kun byed pa'i phyag mtshan no/ /pad+ma rab tu rgyas 'dra ba/ /ngos bzhi sor bzhi bor nas ni/ /de yi tshad kyang
<p>19a.5</p>kha khyer la/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje phreng ba yongs brtsigs pas/ /phyi rol kha khyer kun du bskor/ /'og gi phyag mtshan phyi rol du/ /rdo rje phreng ba gang smra ba/ /de rnams phyag mtshan gzhan dag gi/ /rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan las cung zad/ /de bzhin
<p>19a.6</p>du yang bzang zhabs kyis/ /sor ni brgyad dang gcig gi tshad/ /mchu dang rngams su rtsa ba yi/ /phyag mtshan shin tu brtan pas na/ /de bzhin du ni gzhan dag kyang / /'di ni rig pas brtag par 'dod/ /yang na bdag po'i 'bras bu ni/ /che la gzhan ni dman pa
<p>19a.7</p>yi/ /phyag mtshan zhes su brjod pa ni/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar mnyam/ /phyag mtshan rnams kyi brgal ba 'di/ /lan ni ji ltar 'debs par byed/ /der yang mkhas pas mi mnyam par/ /skyes bu dam pas 'dod ma yin/ /phyi rol rdo rje 'phro ba yis/ / 
<p>19b</p>
<p>19b.1</p>bskor ba 'di ni mi 'gal te/ /de rnams phyag mtshan la ltos nas/ /de bzhin phyi rol bsgral 'dod na/ /'bras bu med cing dka' ba skye/ /blo ldan ji ltar nye bar brten/ /lung dang rigs pas sgrub byed pa/ /phyogs 'di la ni yod ma yin/ /skyon yang cung zad byin pa ste/ /rgya
<p>19b.2</p>che mang pos ci zhig bya/ /de ltar bstan pa'i thab khung du/ /sngags kyis sbar ba'i me la ni/ /'bar ba'i ched du mar ni blugs/ /de la 'dir ni me sbar ba'i sngags te/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM hUM/ shar phyogs kha bstan ku sha rnams/ /g.yas skor gyis ni sbyin par
<p>19b.3</p>bya/ /re re nas ni shar phyogs rtse/ /thab khung ku shas dgab par bya/ /thab khung bdag med par dmigs nas/ /raM las byung ba'i ser skya ser/ /g.yas g.yon zhal ni gnag dang dkar/ /lus thung zhal ni ser po ste/ /shes rab las 'khyud ral pa

<p>23b</p>

<p>24a</p>
<p>24a.1</p>bgegs kyi dgra yi rdo rje ni/ /kha gdengs yang dag bstan ji bzhin/ /sna tshogs chu skyes zla dkyil la/ /gtso bo'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /shar sogs phyogs su gnas pa'i 'dab ma dmar 'od can/ /rlung dang me yi 'dab ma ser po'i ngo bo ste/ /yi dgas bdag dang
<p>24a.2</p>dbang ldan phyogs kyi chu skyes mdog /dUr ba dang ni sngo bsangs sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /rnam snang mdzad dang lha mo bcu'i/ /dkyil 'khor sngar bzhin spro bar bya/ /gzhan ni ji ltar rigs pa bzhin/ /gtum 'od dkyil 'khor la bri bya/ /lnga yi phyogs la mtshan ma bzhi/ /ngos
<p>24a.3</p>su bdag po'i gdong la bri/ /spyan ma la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /mtshan ma bum pa gcig la bri/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje ma sogs kyi/ /mtshan ma drug ni gcig la'o/ /khro bo gsum gyi mtshan ma ni/ /gcig la'o gcig ni de bzhin gcig/ /bcu yi phyogs la lha mo bzhi'i/ / 
<p>24a.4</p>mtshan ma de bzhin re re dang / /khro bo rnams kyi so so ste/ /lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bri/ /dkar po dri yi chu yis gang / /mgrin pa dkar ser gos dang ldan/ /a mra'i lcug mas mdzes pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ni/ / 
<p>24a.5</p>bsams byas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /zhu ba'i rnam par yang gyur pa/ /rnam rgyal sogs la rab tu gzhug /thod pa'i steng du phreng ba'i rtser/ /rdo rje btags pa der bzhag nas/ /de nas sngags pas mtshan ma rnams/ /bdag po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla/ /oM AH 
<p>24a.6</p>badzra satwa hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa'i'o/ /oM AHbadzra d+h+r-i ka hUM/ mi bskyod pa'i'o/ /oM AHdzi na dzika hUM/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o/ /oM AHrat+na d+h+r-i ka hUM/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o/ /oM AHA ro l-i ka hUM/ 'od dpag med kyi'o/ /oM AHpradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka hUM/ don yod grub pa'i'o/ / 
<p>24a.7</p>oM AH mo ha ra ti hUM/ spyan ma'i'o/ /oM AHdwe Sha ra ti hUM/ mA ma kI'i'o/ /oM AHrA ga ra ti hUM/ /dkar mo'i'o/ /oM AHbadzra ra ti hUM/ sgrol ma'i'o/ /oM AHrU pa badzrA hUM/ oM AH shap+da badzrA hUM/ oM AHgan+d+ha badzrA hUM/ oM AHra sa badzrA hUM/ oM AHspaR+sha badzA hUM/ oM AH 
<p>24b</p>
<p>24b.1</p>d+harma badzA hUM/ oM AHya mAn+ta kr-i ta hUM/ oM AHpra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita hUM/ oM AHpad+mAn+ta kr-ita hUM/ /oM AH big+h+nA n+ta kr-i ta hUM/ /las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan mas mtshan/ /yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi/ /mtshan mas mtshan la de nyid kyi/ /sngags kyis
<p>24b.2</p>lhag par gnas par bya/ /bstod pa lnga ni sngon 'gro ba'i/ /mchod pa kun gyis yang dag mchod/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /rdo rje dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag
<p>24b.3</p>pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos/ /rdo rje dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med/ /gsang ba'i dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje dpag med
<p>24b.4</p>rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che/ /rdo rje dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bya ba rtsom
<p>24b.5</p>pa thams cad la/ /blo bzang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /bgegs kun nye bar zhi ched du/ /dang po tha mar gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas lag pa g.yas brkyang la/ /nyi mar hUM yig rnam par bsgom/ /oM ma hA badzra hUM swA hA/ /cig shos la yang zla bar ni/ /a yig rnam par bsgom par
<p>24b.6</p>bya/ /oM AHbadzra g+haN+Te AHswA hA/ zhes pas byin brlabs gtor ma sbyin/ /yi ge brgya ba lan bdun bzla/ /de la 'di ni yi ge brgya pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ su poSh+yo me b+ha ba/ a
<p>24b.7</p>nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sar+b+ba sed+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM ha ha ha ha hoH b+ha ga bAn sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya sa twa aH/ de ltar byas nas nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //sku gzugs la
<p>25a</p>
<p>25a.1</p>sogs mtshan nyid bzang / /mtshan mo lhag par gnas par bya/ /de nas shar du zhal phyogs pa'i/ /yang na gzhan du phyogs te gzhag /rdo rje khu tshur yungs kar bcas/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /lan gsum nges par bskor bya zhing / / 
<p>25a.2</p>de nas me dang chu la dor/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /gser snod la sogs rnams dang ni/ /gos gzhan kang+ka NA sogs dang / /shI ta li kA la sogs dang / /kham phor sogs kyis nges par bya/ /mchod yon la sogs bsang gtor bar/ / 
<p>25a.3</p>snod ni man+ji'i steng du'o/ /zangs kyi snod ni shin tu yang / /las kun pa la rab tu shis/ /oM pra ba ra sat+kA rAr+g+hu m+p+ra tIts+tsha swA hA/ lag pa dag kha sbyar bas dung gi mchod yon no/ /oM pra bar sat+kA rA pA d+yaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ /zhes pas mthe bong mdzub mo dang bcas pa dag gis me
<p>25a.4</p>tog gcig blangs nas 'gyid ba dang bcas pas mthe chung dang mthe bong dag bkrol bas zhabs bsil lo/ /oM pra ba ra sat+kA rA tsa ma ni pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ /mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag gis chu blangs te dbul bar bya'o/ /oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra prok+Sha NaM pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ /lag pas ku sha'i chun pos
<p>25a.5</p>bsang gtor ro/ /mchod yon la sogs pa 'di thams cad rnam pa gsum du bya'o/ /bgegs dgra'i sngags kyi sbyor ldan pa'i/ /ba byung lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga/ /dUr ba'i pir la sogs pa yis/ /mi bskor bar ni bkru bar bya/ /ba lang lci ba chu dang ni/ /mar dang zho dang 'o mar bcas/ / 
<p>25a.6</p>lha yi khrus ni sgrub pa la/ /ba byung lnga ru shes par bya/ /lci ba dang ni chu bor nas/ /'o ma zho dang mar ldan pa/ /ka ra sbrang rtsir bcas pa ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga zhes 'dir brjod bya/ /u dum+bA ra shi rI Sha/ /a shwat+tha dang parka ti/ /pa ta rnams ni mdangs 'gugs phyir/ /de dag shing shun lnga
<p>25a.7</p>zhes bya/ /de nas blo dang ldan pa yis/ /dri bzang til mar sngags kyis so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ shing shun lnga dang dri yis kyang / /de bzhin byugs shing nges par bkru/ /tsan+dan gnyis dang gran+thi lA/ /de bzhin kha che a ka ru/ /dri lnga zhes ni rab brjod de/ / 
<p>25b</p>
<p>25b.1</p>lha yi khrus la brten pa yin/ /rgyal po dbang bskur tshul du ni/ /glu dang gar dang dga' ston che/ /blo ldan spyan sogs phyag bzung pa'i/ /bum pa rnams kyis sku khrus gsol/ /dang por rnam rgyal bum pas te/ /de nas rnam snang mdzad sogs kyis/ /spyan ma sogs
<p>25b.2</p>kyis de ma thag /gshin rje'i gshed sogs bum pa yis/ /sngags pas tshigs bcad 'don zhing bya/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA
<p>25b.3</p>ga tA b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ ri mor bris pa la sogs pa/ /thams cad me long la chus bkru/ /rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rdzing bu dang ni gtsug lag khang / /dzaM g+ha li dang dri gtsang khang / /la sogs me long ngos la bkru/ /ras ris la ni chu med pa'i/ /gur
<p>25b.4</p>gum byugs shing pany+tsa ra/ /mdangs gsal shis shing bkra ba yi/ /gos sar gyis ni yang dag dkri/ /oM badzra bA sa se swA hA/ /oM badzrA b+ha ra Na b+hU Sha Ne swA hA/ chu skyes de bzhin thang las skyes/ /me tog dam pa 'di dag ni/ /bdag gis dad pas dbul lags kyi/ /ci bde
<p>25b.5</p>bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM AHbadzra puShe hUM/ lhan skyes de bzhin sbyar las byung / /bdug spos dam pa 'di dag ni/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM AHbadzra d+hu be huM/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung / /shangs
<p>25b.6</p>ni tshim byed dri 'di dag /mchog tu dad pas 'bul lags kyi/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM AHbadzra gan+d+he hUM/ mun sel 'bru mar rtsi mar skyes/ /lha rdzas 'bar ba'i mar me 'di/ /mi shes thams cad rab zhi'i slad/ /bdag nyid dad pas dbul
<p>25b.7</p>bar bgyi/ /oM AHbadzra dIb+pe hUM/ kha dog dri dang ro ldan zhing / /bza' dad bca' bar yang dag ldan/ /thams cad sbyar ba'i zhal zas dag /'bul gyis yang dag bzhes su gsol/ /oM AHbadzra nai bi d+ye hUM/ rdzing bu khron pa'i mthil son skyes/ /sems can thams
<p>26a</p>
<p>26a.1</p>cad tshim par byed/ /kun nas dag pa'i chab 'di dag /'bul gyis yang dag bzhes su gsol/ /nA ga par+Ni'i 'dab ldan zhing / /pU ga dzA ti yang dag ldan/ /ga pur dang bcas tshems rtsi dag /'bul gyis yang dag bzhes su gsol/ /oM AH 
<p>26a.2</p>badzra tAm+bu le hUM/ de ltar mchod pa byas te/ /de nas sngar bshad pa'i mi bskyod rdo rje la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad kyis bstod cing / /bkra shis gang zhig la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad rnams kyis yang yang bstod par bya'o/ /phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten
<p>26a.3</p>gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /de yis de ring khyod la zhi byed bkra shis shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i/ /gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs pa/ /dbang bcas
<p>26a.4</p>lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /de yis de ring khyod la zhi byed bkra shis shog /bkra shis gang zhig phan mdzad dam pa gtsang ma'i mchog /bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ /bcom ldan thub pa shAkya seng ges gang gsungs pa/ / 
<p>26a.5</p>de yis de ring khyod la zhi byed bkra shis shog /de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa yin/ /dge 'dun
<p>26a.6</p>dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa yin/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis nam
<p>26a.7</p>mkhar de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa thams cad spyan drangs te ji ltar rigs par me tog la sogs pa rnams dang / gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis bstod pa byas nas mkhas pas bdud rtsi myangs te/ zhal bsil dang tAm+bul phul nas thal mo
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te me tog 'thor zhing 'di skad brjod do/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta su la li ta bi lA sa na mi tai rnA mA mi b+ha ga bAn+taM shrI many+dzu badzA bye dzaHhUM baM hoHbra tits+tshe maM ku su mAny+dza lin+d+ra tha hoHsam ya s+t+waM sam ya satwa haM zhes so/ /de nas bdug spos thogs byas nas/ /pus mo sa gzhi la bkod de/ / 
<p>26b.2</p>'byon 'gyur mgon po spyan 'dren pa'i/ /tshig 'di ched du brjod par bya/ /bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po thugs brtse'i bdag nyid can/ /rab tu gnas pa bgyid par 'tshal/ /sems can bsod nams spel phyir
<p>26b.3</p>dang / /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni der gus la/ /bka' drin dag ni mdzad par 'os/ /ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /dga' ldan du ni bzhugs ba las/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs pa/ /de bzhin 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol/ /
