<p>88b.4</p>yang zhes pa la sogs pa ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor zhus pa ste/ rten gyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bsams te/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mdun du dmigs la mchod pa rnams rdzogs par byas te/ rang gi sku la
<p>88b.5</p>sogs pa'i rdo rje la dbang bskur ba ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin te/ dbab par bya zhes te bskur ba'i tha tshig go/ /de'i sbyor ba la dbab pa dang / kha zas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa'i bye brag dang / sbyor ba'i cho ga dang drag
<p>88b.6</p>shul gyi bya ba dang / bdud rtsi btung ba dang / de'i bsam gtan la gnas na bsod nams kyi tshogs mi bya ba dang / dug 'byin cing gnon pa dang lus ngag sems bsrung ba'i cho ga dang / ma mo la sogs pa'i gnas su rdo rje a dza na sgrub pa'i thabs
<p>88b.7</p>dang / 'bras bu rnams gsungs pa ste/ de dag gi cho ga ni bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o/ /gsang ba'i yi ge gsungs pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas/ cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes pa'i bar du ste/ yi ge ni sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge
<p>89a</p>
<p>89a.1</p>ste/ byang chub sems dpas ni rtogs par dka' bar ma zad/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rtogs par dka' ste/ yi ge de nyid ma thos par mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yi ge ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / gsang ba'i dkyil
<p>89a.2</p>'khor rnams te/ chos dang bsod nams kyi rgyu 'grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs pa bzhi ni lha mo bzhi'i dbyangs kyis bskul ba ste/ chos kyi sku gang yin pas 'gro ba la snang ba ma yin pas/ de'i phyir dgyes pa'i bstod pas gzugs kyi skur bskul
<p>89a.3</p>bar mdzad de/ 'dod chags kyi rjes su byang chub chud pa nyid de/ de'i don gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes zhes pa nas/ 'dug go zhes pa'i bar rnams ni yongs su gtang ba ste/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' yun ring gnas shing phan
<p>89a.4</p>gdags pa'i phyir/ skal ba mchis pa'i phyir zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos nas spyir gtad pa dang / sdud pa po rdo rje chos la dmigs kyis gtad pa'o/ /dbang bskur nas de bzhin bgyi'o/ /zhes khas blangs
<p>89a.5</p>te/ shes pa'i rgyud la gnas nas/ yongs su chub par byas so/ /cang mi gsung ba ni gong gi bdag nyid rnams de'i rang bzhin te/ de dang de nyid du 'brel pas de skad ces bya ste/ ci yang ma yin pa nyid dang ldan pas gsang ba'i don la zhugs pa ste/ mnyam
<p>89a.6</p>pa nyid du lhun gyis grub par sbyor ba'o/ /le'u bcu bdun pa'i don rdzogs so// //brjod par bya ba'i rgyud 'di yi/ /dgongs pa nye bar len pa'i 'grel/ /rdo rje bzhad pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /sems can ye shes bskyed phyir te/ /'di brtsams pa las byung ba yis/ /dge ba dri med gang yin
<p>89a.7</p>pa/ /yang dag slob ma dri med dang / /sems can kun gyis thob par shog /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dgongs pa thams cad nye bar len pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ / 
<p>89b</p>
<p>89b.1\] ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza tan+t+ra ni dA na gu rU pa de she nA khya ta/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bla ma'i man ngag gis bshad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bla ma'i man ngag gis bshad par bya'o/ / 
<p>89b.2</p>de la rgyud 'di mgo mjug tu phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan par ston to/ /lnga gang zhe na/ ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa dang / gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bas ni ston
<p>89b.3</p>pa phun sum tshogs pa ston to/ /bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na zhes bya bas ni sdud pa phun sum tshogs pa ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba nas btsun mo'i dkyil na bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gnas phun sum tshogs
<p>89b.4</p>pa ston to/ /brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gang bar snang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ston to/ /'dis ci'i phyir rgyud phun sum tshogs pa ston zhe na/ ji skad brjod
<p>89b.5</p>pas rgyud mgo mjug gi don rdzogs par 'dren pa'i phyir rgyud phun tshogs pa ston to/ /de la yang bcom ldan 'das zhes gong du bstan pa ni kun rdzob tu 'dod chags nas phrag dog gi bar gyi chos lnga po'i rang bzhin dang / sa bon gyi ngo bor gnas par bstan te/ de'i
<p>89b.6</p>ngo bo lhun gyis grub pa ni 'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas/ zhe sdang mi 'khrugs pa/ gti mug rnam par snang mdzad/ nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ldan/ phrag dog gdon mi za bar grub pa/ sa bon ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o/ /chos lnga po 'di dag
<p>89b.7</p>las ye shes lngar yang sbyar te/ de la me long lta bu'i ye shes ni mi 'khrugs pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni rin chen 'byung ldan/ so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes ni snang ba mtha' yas/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'o/ /ci'i phyir
<p>90a</p>
<p>90a.1</p>gdon mi za bar grub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bor bstan zhe na/ las kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so/ /ye shes 'di dag
<p>90a.2</p>las gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bor gnas pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la rim par sbyar na gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad/ tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan/ 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas/ 'du byed gdon mi za bar grub pa/ 
<p>90a.3</p>rnam par shes pa mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /'di dag thams cad dam tshig gi ngo bor yang shes par bya ste/ de la yang gzugs rnam gsum ni rnam par snang mdzad/ sgra rnam gsum ni rin chen 'byung ldan/ dri rnam gsum ni snang ba mtha' yas/ ro rnam
<p>90a.4</p>gsum ni gdon mi za bar grub pa/ reg rnam gsum ni mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems lhun gyis grub pa las chos lnga po 'di dag skyed par byed de/ lnga gang zhe na/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha'o/ /de ji ltar skyed par byed ce na/ de yang rim
<p>90a.5</p>par dbye na/ sa'i khams ni sangs rgyas spyan/ chu'i khams ni mA ma kI/ me'i khams ni gos dkar mo/ rlung gi khams ni 'phags ma sgrol ma/ nam mkha'i khams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /de yang 'bras bu rnam pa lnga skyed par byed de/ de
<p>90a.6</p>gang zhe na/ zad par sar bsgoms pas ni nam mkha' la 'chag pa dang gzhal med khang mngon par skyed par byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems rlan pa lta bu'i rang bzhin du bsgoms pas ni 'jig rten thams cad chus yongs su gang bar spro ba dang bsdu ba nus
<p>90a.7</p>par 'gyur ro/ /mer bsgoms pas ni 'bar ba'i rdzu 'phrul skyed par byed do/ /rlung gi khams su bsgoms pas ni yid kyi 'gro ba skyed par byed do/ /nam mkha'i khams su bsgoms pas ni sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes skyed par byed do/ /'bras bu mdo
<p>90b</p>
<p>90b.1</p>tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/ /gzhan yang mig la sogs pas 'phrul gyi mig la sogs pa skyed pa'i rgyur yang ston te/ de yang gang zhe na/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid do/ /de la mig ni sa'i snying po/ rna ba ni phyag na rdo rje/ sna
<p>90b.2</p>ni nam mkha'i snying po/ lce ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /lus ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba/ yid ni rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /de ltar bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di dag skyed par byed de/ sa'i snying pos 'phrul gyi mig /phyag na rdo rjes 'phrul gyi rna ba/ 
<p>90b.3</p>nam mkha'i snying pos 'phrul gyi sna/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'phrul gyi lce ste/ sems can sna tshogs la sgra sna tshogs kyis so so'i mos ba ji lta ba bzhin chos ston pa'o/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel bas lus kyi rdzu 'phrul dang yid kyi gzugs dang sprul pa skyed
<p>90b.4</p>par byed do/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul yang skyed par byed do/ /yid rdo rje sems dpas ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad pa'i ye shes skyed par byed do/ /mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus su 'phags
<p>90b.5</p>pa gshin rje gshed lag pa gnyis te lcags kyu'i don/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje pad+mor zhugs pa ste zhags pa'i tshul/ 'phags pa rta mgrin ni phyag rgya chen po dang mu dra gnyis zhal sbyor ba ste lcags sgrog gi don to/ /'phags pa bdud rtsi
<p>90b.6</p>'khyil pa las kyi phyir las kyi dus su bde ba chen po'i gnas gnyis mnyes par byed pa ste dril bu'i don to/ /de dag thams cad byang chub kyi sems las byung bar ston to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bskyed par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ sngar bsdus pa'i don gsal
<p>90b.7</p>bar bstan nas/ phyis slob dpon gyi rgyud bshad par brtsam par bya'o/ /de la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba nas/ btsun mo'i dkyil na bzhugs so zhes pa'i bar dag gi don ni slob dpon gyi man ngag gis bstan par bya ste/ e zhes pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya/ waM zhes
<p>91a</p>
<p>91a.1</p>pa ni phyag rgya chen po/ ma ni chos kyi phyag rgya/ yA ni las kyi phyag rgya/ shru kra zhes pa ni spro ba'i don to/ /e zhes pa ni gzungs ma'o/ /waM zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ 'di'i dus na zhes pa ni 'di'i tshe na zhes bya bar sbyar/ yang na sa ma
<p>91a.2</p>ya zhes pa ni dus dang mi sbyar gyi/ 'di'i phyag rgya nyid la gnas so zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bdud sde bzhi bcom pa dang / legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pa'i phyir yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ ye
<p>91a.3</p>shes phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba'i phyir yang bcom ldan 'das so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa ni ji ltar skye ba bzhin skyes pa'i phyir yang de bzhin gshegs zhes pa'o/ /de la yang ji ltar skye zhe na/ pha ma gnyis thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i
<p>91a.4</p>dbang gis pho mo phrad par gyur nas/ de nyid rnam par sbyangs nas yang dag pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /yang na ji ltar 'ongs bzhin 'gro ba'i phyir yang de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /dper na zangs dang 'khar ba la sogs pa rdzas
<p>91a.5</p>kyi dngos po gcig la chol zangs su byas pa'i dus na ni btsog par 'dzin cing mchil snabs la sogs pa 'dor bar byed/ de la gzhong ba la sogs par byas na ni gtsang bar 'dzin cing / zas skom la sogs pa 'jog cing za bar byed/ de la sku gzugs
<p>91a.6</p>la sogs pa byas pa'i dus na ni phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i las su byed do/ /de dang 'dra bar 'khor ba'i rgyu 'dod chags kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i dus na ni smad cing spang bar bya ba yin la de nyid thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du sbyor ba'i dus na rdo rje sems
<p>91a.7</p>dpa'i skur grub par byed pa'i dga' ba'i longs spyod kyi gnas kyang yin la/ de ltar thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi longs spyod goms pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid mngon par grub par byed do/ /de bzhin du 'dod chags
<p>91b</p>
<p>91b.1</p>nas phrag dog gi bar gyi chos lnga po 'di dag kyang dang po'i tshul ltar spyad na ngan song gi rgyu yang yin/ de nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag par bsgoms na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i rgyu yang yin pas nyes par mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ / 
<p>91b.2</p>de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra mang du sbyar zhing bshad ci dgos te/ rgyud kyi don nges par bstan pa 'di yin no// //sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil na bzhugs so zhes bya ba la/ sku gsung thugs ni lus ngag yid do cog gi rang bzhin yang yin la/ 
<p>91b.3</p>de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yang yin pas de'i phyir sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /snying po ni sa bon te/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i btsun mo'i dkyil na bzhugs so zhes pa ni btsun mo ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya/ dkyil zhes pa ni pad+mo ste de ni bzhugs par
<p>91b.4</p>sbyar/ de yang ji ltar bzhugs she na/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po ye shes kyi rang bzhin chu lta bu'i ngo bo zla ba lta bur dkar zhing dag pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /de la yang 'di skad ces pa nas btsun mo'i dkyil na bzhugs so zhes pa'i bar de dag rnam grangs gzhan du yang bstan par bya ste/ e ni chos kyi
<p>91b.5</p>'byung gnas/ waM ni rdo rje ma ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i ye shes kyi sa bon/ ya ni bskyod pa las kyi mtshan nyid/ shru kra ni 'byung ba'i don/ e ka ni ldan pa'i mtshan nyid/ 'di'i dus na zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dges pa'i gnas b+ha ga bAn ni b+ha ga'i gnas na bzhugs pa'i
<p>91b.6</p>phyir/ b+ha ga bAn zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje zhes pa ni sa bon zla ba lta bu dang sbyar/ btsun mo'i dkyil na bzhugs so zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i
<p>91b.7</p>pad+ma'i gnas na bzhugs par ston to/ /bi dza ha ra'i sgras ni bzhugs pa'i don to/ /bzhugs so zhes pa'i sgras ni rnam par gnas so zhes pa'i don to/ /yang rnam grangs gzhan du yang bshad par bya ste/ e khaM zhes pa ni 'dzin pa'i don te/ sdud par mdzad pa rdo rje chos kyis bsdus
<p>92a</p>
<p>92a.1</p>pa'o/ /de yang 'di skad ces bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes pa'i bar dag /bdag gis mngon sum du thos so zhes ston to/ /bdag gis zhes pa ni gzhan dang gzhan las brgyud pa lta bu ma yin pa'i don to/ / 
<p>92a.2</p>sa ma ya zhes pa'i sgra ni dus mtshon pa'o/ /'di ltar dus mtshon pa yang dus gsum la sogs pa dus nges par bstan pa ni ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi bcom pa dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom
<p>92a.3</p>ldan 'das zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snying po rdo rje zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs kyi snying po'i sa bon ni rdo rje zhes pa ni mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /btsun mo zhes pa ni phyag rgya'i don to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'byung
<p>92a.4</p>gnas de'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes bya ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /skabs 'dir gzhan dag gis brgal ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa zhes bya bas chog mod/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dgos ched med de/ de nas zhes bya ba dang rgyud ldan pa'am/ lhan cig ces byas na tshig 'brel
<p>92a.5</p>cing bde ste/ de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu brjod na ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes brjod pa'i rigs kyi/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i dus su 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa 'di rigs pa ma yin no zhe na/ lan du rigs
<p>92a.6</p>pa yin te/ rgyud thams cad las kyang 'di skad bdag gis thos so zhes 'byung la/ ston pa mya ngan las 'das so zhes ni rgyud gzhan gang las kyang ma gsungs so/ /kha cig gis brgal ba/ rgyud sdud par mdzad pa dag med do zhes gzhan dag smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyud 'di dag
<p>92a.7</p>gnyis su med par gnas pa'i phyir ro zhe'o/ /lan du rgyud 'di dag las phyir gyur pa gzhan dag ci ste 'dri ba po zhig med na rgyud 'di dag ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhes rnam par rtog ste/ /de dag bsal ba'i phyir 'di skad bdag gis thos so zhes smos so/ /brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
<p>92b</p>
<p>92b.1</p>zhes pa ni rgya gar gyi sgra dang sbyar na a phyi la ba ni grangs bstan pa yin la/ nas bkag na grangs las 'das pa'i don du bstan pa yin te/ de'i phyir brjod du med pa zhes bya'o/ /yang brjod du med pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang yon tan brjod du med pa ste/ de'i phyir brjod du med pa'i brjod
<p>92b.2</p>du med pa zhes bya'o/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa zhes pa ni rab tu mang po'i don te grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes pa la byang chub ni phyag rgya/ sems dpa' ni 'dod pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub
<p>92b.3</p>sems dpa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni gnyis su med par gnas pa'i don to/ /sems dpa' chen po zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes la gnas so zhes bya ba'i don te/ de'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de lta bas na chos kyi 'byung gnas la gnas so/ /de yang
<p>92b.4</p>su'i thad na bzhugs she na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor na bzhugs so/ /de la gong du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bsdus pa'i don du bstan gyi/ gang dang gang bzhugs pa bstan pa'i phyir 'dir so so'i mtshan
<p>92b.5</p>yang smos so/ /de la dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang zhes bya ba thog mar ci'i phyir smos she na/ dam tshig gis lha rnams mnyes pa'i rgyur byed pa'i phyir gtsor smos te dang por bstan pa yin no/ /dam tshig nyid ji lta bu zhen rnam pa gnyis te/ phyi dang nang ngo / / 
<p>92b.6</p>de la phyi gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i bsrung bar bya ba rnams so/ /nang gi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa bza' ba'o/ /de ltar dam tshig bsrungs nas sku bsgrub pa'i phyir sku rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba smos so/ /gang gis sku grub pa dang / 
<p>92b.7</p>tshig kyang dgos te/ sku dang gsung mi phyed par bstan pa'i phyir te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du mngon par sprul nas gnas par bstan to/ /de'i phyir gsung rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes smos so/ /de ltar tshig 'grub nas sems
<p>93a</p>
<p>93a.1</p>dpyod par byed de/ de la sems ni dngos po thams cad dang rang bzhin gyis bral bar yang mkhyen la/ thams cad dang mi gnyis par yang mkhyen pas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du mngon par sprul nas gnas par bstan te/ de'i phyir thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang
<p>93a.2</p>chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes smos so/ /de la sku gsung thugs ting nge 'dzin med par sangs rgyas kyi sku gnyis su med par mngon par mi 'grub pas/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes smos so/ /de ltar ting nge 'dzin thob
<p>93a.3</p>nas gang gis sems mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba de rgyal bar bstan pa yin te/ de'i phyir rgyal ba rdo rje zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smos so/ /gang gis sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs lha mo dang ldan pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes rgyal ba de thams cad
<p>93a.4</p>sa la sogs pa med par gzugs bskyed par mi nus pas de'i phyir sa rdo rje zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du bstan te/ de'i phyir sa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smos so/ /da ni chos kyi chu'i char 'bebs pas
<p>93a.5</p>chu rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya bar bstan to/ /de'i phyir chu rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /de ltar chu rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpar bstan nas me las thams cad 'grub par bstan pa'i phyir me rdo rje zhes bya bar bstan to/ /de ltar me rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
<p>93a.6</p>byang chub sems dpar bstan nas/ thams cad du 'gro ba'i gzugs lhun gyis grub par bstan pa'i phyir/ rlung rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpar bstan to/ /de ltar rlung rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpar bstan nas/ sgrib pa med par snang ba'i rang bzhin nam mkha' rdo rje
<p>93a.7</p>zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par sprul pa'i phyir nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' smos so/ /de ltar nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba mngon par bsgrubs nas/ da ni gnyis su med pa la dmigs pa lta bas chog mi shes pa'i
<p>93b</p>
<p>93b.1</p>gzugs ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bstan te/ de'i phyir gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' smos so/ /de ltar gzugs ji lta bu yang bstan nas/ gnyis su med pa'i sgras sems can thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pa'i sgra bzhin dang / gang dag gis sgrar brjod
<p>93b.2</p>pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du gnas par bstan te/ de'i phyir sgra rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' smos so/ /de ltar pad+ma dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgra bstan nas/ da ni bdag nyid rab tu tshim pa myong bar bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das kyis
<p>93b.3</p>mngon par sprul nas gnas par bstan te/ de'i phyir dri rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' smos so/ /de ltar dri rdo rjes bdag dang gzhan gyi sems tshim par byed pa bstan nas/ da ni dam tshig dang zhal mi gnyis pa sprad pa'i ro myang bar bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du
<p>93b.4</p>gnas par bstan te/ de'i phyir ro rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpar smos so/ /de ltar ro rdo rje zhes bya bar bstan nas/ dbang po gnyis reg pa'i bde ba bstan pa'i phyir reg rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' smos so/ /de ltar de yan chad du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mdor
<p>93b.5</p>bstan pa'am yang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du bstan pa yin no/ /de ltar reg rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpar bstan nas/ rdo rje dang pad+mor ldan pa las byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i dus na rnal 'byor pas shes par bya ba ni/ 'dod chags ma yin chags
<p>93b.6</p>bral min/ /gnyis ka min pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhes bstan pa khong du chud par bya zhing byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba na bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' smos so/ /de la sogs pa brjod du med
<p>93b.7</p>pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhes bya ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang zhes pa'i bar dag ni gong du bstan pas 'dir ma smos so/ /de ltar 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas/ da ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ston te/ de yang tshad ji tsam zhe na/ nam mkha'i
<p>94a</p>
<p>94a.1</p>dbyings dang mnyam pa zhes 'byung mod kyi/ re zhig 'dir mi bskyod pa la sogs pa gtso bo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/ /de la bdag gi 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog rnams kyi rang bzhin bstan te/ mi bskyod pa rdo rje zhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs
<p>94a.2</p>pa gang dag zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems de'i ngo bor gnas par bstan to/ /rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang dag gti mug dang bcas pa rnams la de'i ngo bor rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshul du gnas par bstan to/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes pa'i de
<p>94a.3</p>bzhin gshegs pa ni gang dag nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sems kyi tshul du rin chen 'byung ldan de'i ngo bor gnas par bstan to/ /tshad med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang dag 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems snang ba mtha' yas de'i rang bzhin las byung bar bstan pa'i
<p>94a.4</p>phyir tshad med pa rdo rje zhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa smos so/ /gdon mi za ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang phrag dog dang ldan pa'i sems de'i ngo bor gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje gnas par bstan to/ /de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par
<p>94a.5</p>bstan pa 'di dag ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs lhun gyis grub par bstan te/ rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag byang chub kyi sems las rang grub pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag rgyud las gtsor smos te bstan pa yin no/ /gzhan yang de bzhin
<p>94a.6</p>gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par bstan pa de dag ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par sprul pas khyad par sprul pa'i don du bstan pa'o/ /de la nam mkha' thams cad ces pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas/ dbyings zhes pa ni sa bon/ mnyam
<p>94a.7</p>zhes pa ni khyab pa/ bstan pa zhes pa ni gsungs pa'i don to/ /'di dag gsungs pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dkyil na sa bon gyi tshul du phyag rgya thams cad kyi skur khyab par gnas par bstan pa'o/ /yang na nam mkha' thams cad ces pa ni lha mo bzhi dang de bzhin gshegs par ldan pa
<p>94b</p>
<p>94b.1</p>phyag rgya chos kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje dang mi gnyis par chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du thams cad sprul nas bzhugs so/ /mang por smos ci dgos te don mdor bstan pa ni 'di dag yin no zhe na/ de la sngar smos pa 'di dag ni byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsdus te bsgrub
<p>94b.2</p>ba'i gzhung gis bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar du skyed do/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid bskyed par ma zad kyi sngags pa nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis mngon par bsgrub bo/ /rgyud 'di nyid kyang 'phags pa nyid kyi sku dang mnyam pa'i tshul du byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o/ / 
<p>94b.3</p>yang na de bzhin nyid rnam par bsgoms la de las snang ba'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de skyes pas yig 'bru'i rgyur 'gyur te sngags kyi 'bru skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de las lus kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'grub par 'gyur te/ de yang mtshan dang gnyis su med pa'i
<p>94b.4</p>sbyor bar ldan pa pad+ma'i gnas na bzhugs pa'i nam mkha'i phyogs na rgyud las smos pa'i lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi yan lag dang nying lag tu blos rnam par rtog ste/ de yang ji ltar rnam par rtog ce na/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog de kho na nyid rnam pa lnga
<p>94b.5</p>dang bdag ldan par rnam par rtog par byed do/ /'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas/ zhe sdang mi bskyod pa/ gti mug rnam par snang mdzad/ nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ldan/ phrag dog gdon mi za bar grub pa/ sa bon rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste/ de las rnam pa lnga
<p>94b.6</p>po 'di dag tu 'gyur bar ston no/ /'dod chags la sogs pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur rnam par brtag go/ /de nas yang ye shes kyi tshul du so sor dbye na/ me long lta bu'i ye shes mi bskyod pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan/ so sor kun du
<p>94b.7</p>rtog pa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes gdon mi za bar grub ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par snang mdzad gang bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs 'di gti mug rnam par snang mdzad/ gang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba mnyam pa nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi tshul
<p>95a</p>
<p>95a.1</p>du gnas pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan/ gang dus gsum du chags pa'i 'du shes 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni snang ba mtha' yas/ gang phrag dog mngon par 'du byed pa'i rang bzhin ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'o/ /gang zhe sdang ba ni mi bskyod pa ste rnam par shes pa'o/ / 
<p>95a.2</p>rnal 'byor pas ni 'dod chags la sogs pa chos ji snyed pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i rang bzhin du bdag gyur par rnam par brtag go/ /gzugs rnam pa gsum gyi tshul du gnas pa rnam par snang mdzad/ sgra rnam pa gsum gyi tshul du gnas pa rin chen 'byung ldan/ dri rnam pa
<p>95a.3</p>gsum gyi tshul du gnas pa ni snang ba mtha' yas/ ro rnam pa gsum gyi tshul du gnas pa ni gdon mi za bar grub ba/ reg rnam pa gsum gyi tshul du gnas pa ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /de ltar rnam par brtags nas yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi ji ltar rnam par brtag ce na/ de la sa'i
<p>95a.4</p>khams ni sangs rgyas spyan/ me'i khams ni gos dkar mo/ /chu'i khams ni mA ma kI/ rlung gi khams ni 'phags ma sgrol ma/ nam mkha'i khams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ mig gi rnam
<p>95a.5</p>par shes pa ni sa'i snying po/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni phyag na rdo rje/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i snying po/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dpal
<p>95a.6</p>rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ 'phrul gyi mig la sogs pa yang rnam par dag go/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi dus su blos 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ lag pa gnyis ni gshin rje gshed kyi rang bzhin te yongs su 'dzin pa'i dus na lcags kyu'i don/ 'phags pa gzhan
<p>95a.7</p>gyis mi thub pa rdo rje pad+mor gnas pa'i dus na zhags pa'i tshul du bsam mo/ /'phags pa rta mgrin ni zhal sprod pa'i dus su lcags sgrog ste/ tshems kyi sgros bsdams pa'o/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa las kyi rang bzhin te/ las kyi dus na bde ba chen po la gnas pa'am mnyes
<p>95b</p>
<p>95b.1</p>par byed pa ste dril bu'i don to/ /sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas de ltar rnam par rtogs par bya'o/ /'di dag thabs chen po ye shes las grub par shes par bya'o/ /rgyud las 'khor sems dpa' gang dag gsungs pa mngon par 'byung ba'i dus na lus thams cad kyi yan
<p>95b.2</p>lag dang nying lag lta bu blos rnam par dbye bar bya ba ste/ de la dam tshig rdo rje dang / sku gsung thugs rdo rje dang / ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang / rgyal ba rdo rje dang / sa rdo rje dang / chu rdo rje dang / me rdo rje dang / rlung rdo rje dang / nam mkha' rdo rje dang / gzugs rdo rje dang / sgra rdo rje dang / 
<p>95b.3</p>dri rdo rje dang / ro rdo rje dang / reg rdo rje dang / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje dang / rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / mi 'khrugs pa rdo rje dang / rin chen 'byung ldan rdo rje dang / snang ba mtha' yas rdo rje dang / gdon mi za bar grub pa rdo rje dang ste/ 'di dag thams cad lus kyi yan lag dang
<p>95b.4</p>nying lag tu blos rim pa bzhin du gtso bo'i skur rnam par brtag go/ /de la dam tshig gi rang bzhin ni bdud rtsi dang ldan pa'i ngo bo ste/ de bas na dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /de la sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la sku ni chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i
<p>95b.5</p>sku'o/ /gsung gi rang bzhin ni gsang sngags thams cad ston pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa la rjes su chags pa'i don ni ting nge 'dzin to/ /de ltar ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa las dgyes pa 'byung ba ni rgyal ba'o/ /sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las skur 'grub
<p>95b.6</p>ste/ sa ni gzhal med khang gi rang bzhin no/ /chu ni gsher ba'o/ /me ni cho 'phrul lo/ /rlung ni brkyang bskum byed pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni lus thams cad gsal bar byed pa'o/ /gzugs ni mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o/ /sgra ni
<p>95b.7</p>rdo rje dang pad+mar ldan pa'o/ /dri ni yid tshim par byed pa'o/ /ro ni zhal gnyis myong bar byed pa'o/ /reg pa ni dbang po gnyis bdar bar byed pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ni bde ba chen po la gnas pa'o/ /mi bskyod pa ni zhe sdang / rnam par snang mdzad ni gti mug /rin chen 'byung
<p>96a</p>
<p>96a.1</p>ldan ni nga rgyal/ gdon mi za bar grub pa ni phrag dog/ /snang ba mtha' yas ni 'dod chags te/ thams cad kyang lus la gnas par shes nas gtso bo 'di dag la sogs pa spro bar mdzad do/ /zhal du zhugs nas dbang po'i lam du byung ste chos
<p>96a.2</p>kyi 'byung gnas kyi dkyil du bdag po'i sku dang ldan par gnas te/ de yang lus thams cad rnam par zhu nas sa bon gyi tshul du bde ba chen po'i lus la gnas par rnal 'byor pas mthong ngo / /sgrub pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi rim gyis bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyi
<p>96a.3</p>rang bzhin du mthong ste 'di nyid phyag rgya chen po'o/ /rdo rje pad+mor ldan pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /bde ba chen po ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /gnyis kyi las gang yin pa de nyid las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje dang pad+mor mnyam par sbyor ba yid kyis mthong nas 'di longs spyod rdzogs
<p>96a.4</p>pa'i sku zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal bskyed do/ /yang na bde ba chen po la gnas te/ byang chub kyi sems sa bon gyi tshul du lus thams cad la khyab ste de la 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog dang / gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
<p>96a.5</p>par shes pa dang / sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid la sogs pa lus thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin du byas nas/ 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbus su 'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ / 
<p>96a.6</p>zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis mnyam par spros nas/ rnam par mi rtog par 'gyur te gnas so/ /de ltar lhun gyis grub nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo skor bar byed do/ /de yang sngon gyi stobs kyis sems can gyi don byed par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rtag tu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
<p>96a.7</p>thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul du gnas te/ thams cad bde ba chen po ye shes kyi tshul du bsgom par bya'o/ /gzugs rnam gsum ni mig gi dbang po la rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshul du yongs su thim mo/ /sgra rnam gsum ni rna ba'i dbang po la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi tshul du
<p>96b</p>
<p>96b.1</p>yongs su thim mo/ /dri rnam gsum ni sna'i dbang po la snang ba mtha' yas kyi tshul du yongs su thim mo/ /ro rnam gsum ni lce'i dbang po la gdon mi za ba'i tshul du yongs su thim mo/ /reg rnam gsum ni lus kyi dbang po la mi bskyod pa'i tshul du yongs
<p>96b.2</p>su thim mo/ /bdag gi lus sam gang dag gi lus dang ldan pa de dag 'di ltar rnam par gnas te/ de la 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin snang ba mtha' yas te 'di ltar nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o/ /gang dag zhe sdang dang ldan pa de dag ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du
<p>96b.3</p>nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gam bdag gi lus la bad kan ltar gnas pa de dag ni gti mug ste rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o/ /rgyas pa ni no pe ka dag las smos te/ 'dir ni sa 'dzin tsam du smos par zad do/ /bza' ba la sogs pa yang
<p>96b.4</p>'dir ma smos so/ /de nas rang bzhin gyis grub pa yang rim bzhin du bstan to/ /byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin bskyed pa mdo tsam zhig bskyed par bya ste/ de bas na 'di ltar brtag par bya'o/ /bdag sngon pha ma phrad pa'i sa bon las bskyed pa bzhin du bdag skyes te/ de bas
<p>96b.5</p>na bdag ni grub pa'o zhes sku 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o/ /ji ltar grub pa dang rim gyis bstan te/ pha gang yin pa de bdag gi lha'o/ /ma gang yin pa de rigs kyi lha mo'o/ /de'i lus kyi 'dod chags gang yin pa de snang ba mtha' yas/ zhe sdang gang yin pa de mi 'khrugs
<p>96b.6</p>ba/ gti mug gang yin pa de rnam par snang mdzad/ nga rgyal gang yin pa de rin chen 'byung ldan/ phrag dog gang yin pa de gdon mi za bar grub pa/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems sa bon gang yin pa de ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste/ de bas de dag mngon par 'byung ngo / /de
<p>96b.7</p>nas yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du bstan te/ pha dang ma'i me long lta bu'i ye shes ni mi bskyod pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni rin chen 'byung ldan/ so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes ni snang ba mtha' yas/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni don yod grub pa/ chos kyi dbyings
<p>97a</p>
<p>97a.1</p>kyi ye shes ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /gzhan yang gzugs la sogs pa de dag thams cad gzugs so zhes dran par bya'o/ /pha dang ma'i gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad/ tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan/ 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas/ 'du byed don
<p>97a.2</p>yod grub pa/ rnam par shes pa mi bskyod pa/ pha dang ma'i lus kyi sa ni sangs rgyas spyan/ chu ni rgyal ba'i yum/ me ni gos dkar mo/ /rlung ni 'phags ma sgrol ma/ nam mkha' ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ yang gzhan yang dran par bya ste/ mig sa'i snying po
<p>97a.3</p>rna ba phyag na rdo rje/ sna nam mkha'i snying po/ lce spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /lus sgrib pa rnam par sel ba/ yid rdo rje sems dpa' pha dang ma kun du sbyor ba'i lcags kyu gshin rje gshed/ rdo rje pad+mar zhugs pa zhags pa ste gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ 'ching ba lcags
<p>97a.4</p>sgrog ste rta mgrin/ las sam sa bon 'byung ba'i dus na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/ de'i dus na bdag zhugs so/ /zhugs pa'i dus na 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha'/ mig rna ba sna lce lus
<p>97a.5</p>yid la sogs pa sa bon rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bskyed de/ bde ba chen po la gnas pa'i dus na'o/ /de bas na bdag dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin no/ /gang dag rdzas dgu'i dngos po las skyes pa'i dus na dgu po de dag rnam par bsgom par
<p>97a.6</p>bya'o/ /de la rdzas dgu ni 'di dag ste/ gzugs tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed rnam par shes pa sa chu me rlung nam mkha'/ mig rna ba sna lce lus yid la sogs pa ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byang chub kyi sems las mngon par sprul te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bdag
<p>97a.7</p>skyes pas/ de'i phyir bdag chos kyi dbyings so/ /de ltar shes par bya ste/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi thams cad du rtag par bsgom par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems las de lta bu'i tshul du skye ba'am/ yang na snang ba mtha' yas kyi tshul du skyes pa'o/ /ye shes tsam du shes par
<p>97b</p>
<p>97b.1</p>byas nas thams cad kyi rang bzhin du bdag bsgom par bya'o/ /gzhan yang rang bzhin gyis grub pa rim gyis bstan par bya ste/ 'dod chags 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin gyis med do/ /de bas na zhe sdang zhe sdang gi rang bzhin gyis med do/ /de bzhin du gti mug gti mug gi
<p>97b.2</p>rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so/ /nga rgyal yang shin tu rang bzhin med do/ /de bzhin du phrag dog kyang rang bzhin med do/ /sa ni rdul phra mo'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chu yang de bzhin no/ /me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yang 'du shes tsam du brtag
<p>97b.3</p>par bya'o/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang stong ngo / /de bzhin du mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la sogs pa yang stong ngo / /gang gi dus na de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems skyes pa de ni yongs su
<p>97b.4</p>mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /de lta bas na bdag rang bzhin gyis grub pa ste/ skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du 'gro ba dang gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang bdag grub pa bzhin no bar shes par bya'o/ /rang bzhin gyis kun 'di ltar lhun gyis grub pa'i
<p>97b.5</p>sgyu ma stong pa'i sbyor gzhi mgon po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bdag go zhes 'di ltar shes par byas na/ rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //[ ]@##/ /dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ 
<p>97b.6</p>@##/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po sangs rgyas kun ngo bo/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rgyal ba'i gtso/ /lha mo'i tshogs bcas bde chen la/ /dad pas rtag tu phyag 'tshal te/ /dpal ldan gsang 'dus rgyud 'di yi/ /don rtogs gsal bar
<p>97b.7</p>bya ba dang / /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bshad par bya/ /dang por sngags pas nges par ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyes byas te/ /dbang bskur gnang ba thob nas ni/ /de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa dang / / 
<p>98a</p>
<p>98a.1</p>de bzhin gsang nyid shes pa dang / /kun byed thams cad za ba yis/ /the tshom med par dngos grub thob/ /gtso la mi phyed dad pa dang / /rnam par mi rtog blo ldan zhing / /dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ni/ /bram ze bsad na'ang 'grub par
<p>98a.2</p>'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni dman pa dang / /dam tshig rnam par spangs pa dang / gsang ba de nyid mi shes pas/ /bsgrubs kyang cung zad 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni dam tshig sdom pa ste/ sha khrag dri chen rdo rje chu/ /lnga pa sems ni 'byung ba ste/ /sngags
<p>98a.3</p>pas cho gas byin brlabs nas/ nyin gcig bzhin du bza' bar bya/ /sbyang sbar de bzhin rtogs byas la/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes bya'i phyir/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bza' bar bya/ /hUM zhes pas ni kun du sbyar/ /AHzhes
<p>98a.4</p>pas ni rtogs par bya/ /oM gyis 'bar bar bsgom byas pa/ /'di ni dam tshig dam pa'o/ /glang chen rta dang sha chen dang / /ba lang khyi sha mchog yin te/ /zas phyir 'di dag bza' bar bya/ /gzhan ni bza' bar mi bya'o/ /sha rnams dag ni ma rnyed na/ /kun la bsgom
<p>98a.5</p>zhing rnam par brtag /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /bza' ba'am yang na btung ba ste/ /brtul zhugs can gyis ci bza' ba/ /dri chu sha yi sbyor ba ste/ /cho ga ji bzhin brtag par bya/ /rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa/ / 
<p>98a.6</p>rang lus ngag yid rdo rje yi/ /snying gar ye shes dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin cod pan du'o/ /dam tshig rdo rje lce rtser ni/ /hUM las rdo rjer bsgom byas la/ /AHdang oM gyi sbyor ba yis/ /zos na byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te/ / 
<p>98a.7</p>sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba/ /dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ste/ /mchog gi dngos grub thams cad byed/ /rtag par gzhan nas dbrog pa dang / /rmad du byung bas gsod pa dang / /'dod chags rdo rje nyid sbyor ba/ /'di ni sdom pas bsdams pa'o/ /dam bca'
<p>98b</p>
<p>98b.1</p>brtul zhugs dka' spyod pa/ /bsten pas 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/ /brten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /slong mo'i zan zas mi bzlas shing / /slong la dga' bar mi bya ste/ /yan lag mi gnyis sngags bzlas la/ /'dod
<p>98b.2</p>pa'i longs spyod kun spyad do/ /lus dang ngag yid bder gnas na/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi 'gyur zhing / /dmyal ba rnams su rtag tu bsreg /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod pas/ / 
<p>98b.3</p>'dod pa'i longs spyod kun brten na/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog thob 'gyur/ /chags pa'i ye shes rtag bsgrubs pas/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga brten zhing / /byang chub dpa' bo chags pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya/ /gzugs sgra dri la
<p>98b.4</p>sogs pa la/ /smad pa dag tu mi bya ste/ /rdo rje 'chang rgyal de nyid ni/ /thams cad du ni yang dag gnas/ /gzugs sgra ro dang reg gi rnams/ /de bzhin rab 'bring tha ma ste/ /khyad par rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /rdo rje sems la mchod par bya/ /sngags
<p>98b.5</p>pas rnam pa 'di dag gis/ /dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas na/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'di dag gis/ /rdo rje gsum nyid thob par 'gyur/ /gal te gti mug can gyis 'das/ /de la dngos grub mi 'byung zhing / /rims dang dug dang nad bgegs kyis/ /bsad nas
<p>98b.6</p>sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /byin gyis rlob par mi mdzad cing / /me tog bdug spos la sogs rnams/ /phul yang bzhes par mi mdzad do/ /'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal zhing / /pha rol tu yang
<p>98b.7</p>dmyal bar 'gro/ /dam tshig spyod pa nyams pa yis/ /gti mug can gyis grub mi 'thob/ /sngar smos sdom la gnas pa ni/ /rtag par mi phyed brtul zhugs kyis/ /lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yi/ /sgrub pa dag ni brtsam par bya/ /nags tshal chen
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>po'i phyogs dag dang / /dben pa chen po'i gnas dag dang / /ri bo ril sul rnams su ni/ /dngos grub rtag tu thob par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung gis/ /'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin du/ /gnas nas
<p>99a.2</p>gnas bsrung rnam par bsam/ /gzugs chen 'bar ba 'jigs byed pa'i/ /khro bo bcu dag phyung nas ni/ /hUM las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i steng / /smad ni rtse mor rnam par bsam/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor phyogs rnams su/ /rim pa bzhin du kun du bsam/ /bgegs
<p>99a.3</p>rnams thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/ /gnod mdzes bka' stsal phur bus gdab/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /dbyar gyi sprin dpung lta bu ste/ /bskal pa'i me dpung bzhin du 'bar/ /g.yas brkyang bar ni rab tu gnas/ /smin mtshams khro gnyer dmar
<p>99a.4</p>ba'i spyan/ /zhal gsum mche gtsigs rnam par sgyur/ /phyag gnyis hUM gi rgya bcings te/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri bsnams/ /g.yon gnyis dgra sta zhags pa 'dzin/ /'di 'dra'i gzugs ni bsam byas nas/ /rang gis
<p>99a.5</p>de la bka' stsal to/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ bi d+ya rA dzA ya hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dag gis/ /bgegs ni kun nas rnam par 'jig/ /blo ldan rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du phur kun
<p>99a.6</p>gdab/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal chen po/ /rdo rje phur bu nyid gnas pa/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /lte ba man chad cha rnams ni/ /rtse mo lta bur rnam par bsgom/ /ro stod khro bo lta bu nyid/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa
<p>99a.7</p>ste/ /bgegs kyi tshogs la 'og tu gzigs/ /de yi sngags 'di brjod bya ste/ /rdo rje phur bu nges btab na/ /bgegs lus shin tu mi g.yo'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba du Sh+TAM hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+hA ro adz+nyA
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>pa ya ti/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ /rdo rje tho ba phyag bsnams mchog /gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par bsgom/ /hUM brjod 'bar ba'i lta bas ni/ /bgegs rnams thams cad phur bus gdab/ /phyogs rnams kun du rdo rje'i me/ /rnam par 'phro ba rnam
<p>99b.2</p>bsams te/ /ma rungs pa ni tshig bsams na/ /phyogs bcu dag tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs mtshams phur bus btab nas ni/ /steng 'og yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /dam pa'i don du bsgom pa ni/ /srid gsum rang bzhin med pa ste/ /dngos po
<p>99b.3</p>med pa bsgom pa'i dngos/ /bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs kun/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis stong gyur nas/ /cho ga 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes sa ni
<p>99b.4</p>byin gyis brlab/ /byang chub rdo rje dmigs nas ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas/ /nam mkha'i khams kun khyab pa yi/ /lha mo mA ma kI ni bsam/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas pa/ /dung dang kun da zla 'dra yi/ /ye shes bdud rtsi las byung ba/ / 
<p>99b.5</p>sa yi khams ni byin gyis brlab/ /chu zheng dpag tshad bye ba ste/ /dang la rang bzhin dri ma med/ /'od zer rnam lngas kun du 'khrigs/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can gyi gnas/ /de dbus b+h+rUM ni gnas pa la/ /gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhal med
<p>99b.6</p>khang / /'khor los sgyur ba bsgom par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje stan nyid du/ /shes rab ldan pas de'i 'og bsam/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa/ /bde gshegs kun gyi pho brang ngo / /rin chen bzhi dngos mchod rten ni/ /'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /ye
<p>99b.7</p>shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi/ /gnas su de ni rnam par bsam/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo rgyan bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /dril bu dar dpyangs 'phen la sogs/ /sgo khyud kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /grwa mtshams dag ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ / 
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>zla gam chun 'phyang gis brgyan pa/ /nyi ma zla la sogs pas brgyan/ /bla re bras pas mdzes gyur cing / /na bza' phreng ba sogs kyis brgyan/ /thig skud bzhi ni yongs btab pas/ /ka ba mchog brgyad kun du gnas/ /de dbus 'khor lo dmigs bya
<p>100a.2</p>ba/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po ste/ /mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rang gi gnas su rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje lha mo bzhi rnams kyang / /'khor lo'i grwar ni rnam par bsgom/ /gshin rje gshed sogs sgor dmigs te/ /sa snying la sogs bsgom par bya/ / 
<p>100a.3</p>nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /sems kyi rdo rje rang bdag nyid/ /zhal gsum phyag drug lta bu ni/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas/ /lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yi/ /mtshan nyid dam pa'i don nyid de/ /tshul bzhin rnal 'byor pas dpyad nas/ /sngags
<p>100a.4</p>'di rab tu brjod par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ nam mkha' bzhin du blta bar bya/ /nam mkha' bstan du med pa ltar/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin med mthong nas/ /yi ge'i rnam pa bsgom par bya/ /bla 'og dbus ni rim bzhin du'o/ /bdag nyid yi
<p>100a.5</p>ge 'bru gsum gzugs/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du/ /kha dog gsum du bskyed nas ni/ /nyi zla pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /oM AHhUM/ dang ba'i zla ba 'dra bar ni/ /yi ge 'bru gsum zhu bar brtag /ye shes 'od zer rnam 'phros pas/ /rgyud drug
<p>100a.6</p>gnas pa'i sems can dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas/ /rang bzhin med par mos pa yis/ /byang chub sems la gzhug par bya/ /oM d+har+m+mAd+hA tu badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ byang chub sems de kun du dag /dri med
<p>100a.7</p>zla ba lta bur gnas/ /kun bsdus bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs kyi ngo bor rnam par bsgom/ /sngags kyi sku ni mthar phyin pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dag /phung po khams su rnam bsams te/ /skye mched la sogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /gzugs kyi
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>phung po rang bzhin du/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu gnas/ /tshor ba dkon mchog dpal dang ni/ /'du shes su ni snang mtha' yas/ /'du byed thams cad gdon mi za/ /rnam par shes su mi bskyod gnas/ /mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas lngar
<p>100b.2</p>ni rab tu grags/ /oM swA aM hA hUM/ sa yi khams ni rnam bsams pa/ /phyi dang nang gi brtan pa ste/ /grub par spyan ni bsam byas na/ /sra ba lta bur byin gyis rlob/ /chu khams mA ma kI ra bsams pa/ /khu ba khrag ni nyid kyi rgyu/ /lus ngag sems zhes brjod pa la/ / 
<p>100b.3</p>gang ba nyid du rnam par gnas/ /me yi khams su rab sbyor ba/ /gos dkar mor ni blta bar bya/ /kun du mchog rab 'bar ba ste/ /de ni 'bar ba lta bur 'byung / /rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin du/ /blo dang ldan pas sgrol ma bsam/ /de ni rlung lnga 'byung ba ste/ /de bzhin yid
<p>100b.4</p>kyi 'gro ba 'grub/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin du/ /kun du bzang mo rab tu brtag /nam mkha' de yi sbyor bas ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so/ /phung po khams kyi bye brag ni/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bar gnas/ /de ltar khams nyid bsam byas
<p>100b.5</p>na/ /de ni kun du tshim par 'gyur/ /mo ha ra ti/ dwe Sha ra ti/ rA gar ti/ badzra ra ti/ mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /lce dang lus dang yid dag tu/ /sa yi snying po la sogs sems/ /skye mched dag tu rnam par bsgom/ /th+l+hiM oM oM oM haM oM/ nang gi skye mched rnams su ni/ / 
<p>100b.6</p>sa yi snying po la sogs gnas/ /phyi yi skye mched rang bzhin du/ /gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas/ /sa snying la sogs sngags rnams ni/ /rdo rje can gyi rgyud las gsungs/ /'di dag rnams ni ma gsungs phyir/ /gzugs la sogs pa ma bris so/ /phyi yi longs
<p>100b.7</p>spyod kyis mchod phyir/ /gzugs sgra dag tu rab tu gnas/ /byin gyi rlabs kyis byin brlabs nas/ /'dod pa lnga ni spyad par bya/ /gzugs ni mig gi spyod yul gnas/ /sgra ni rna ba'i gnas su gnas/ /dri ni sna dang mtshungs ldan te/ /ro ni lce la rab tu gnas/ /reg
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>ni lus kyi bde bar gnas/ /phyi yi skye mched nyid dag ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /gshin rje gshed po lag pa g.yas/ /gzhan gyis mi thub g.yon pa ste/ /kha la rta mgrin bsgom par bya/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rdo rje la'o/ /ya
<p>101a.2</p>mAn+ta kr-ita/ pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita/ pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ bib+h+nAn+ta kr-ita/ de ltar don kun rab zhugs nas/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag gtso bo ni/ /bskyed nas byin gyis brlab bya ste/ /tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba gdab/ /spyi bo'i dbus gyur bsam pa ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ste/ /der ni oM dkar
<p>101a.3</p>'od ldan pa'i/ /'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba'o/ /de las lha mo rnams 'phro ba/ /bdag po'i rab tu sbyor ba ste/ /spyan ni rnam par bsam bya ba/ /nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar ro/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rnam bsams pa/ /bar snang khams ni gang bar gnas/ /de dbus bdag por bsam
<p>101a.4</p>bya zhing / /bdag gi mdun na gnas par ro/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /sngags pa de yis bcol ba ni/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gnyis brjod/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum
<p>101a.5</p>bsgoms pas/ /deng nyid byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms te/ /deng nyid byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol/ /spyan dang thabs cig ldan par
<p>101a.6</p>ni/ /rtag par rnam par bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin zhugs par mos byas la/ /phung po lnga ni byin gyis brlab/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku ni gang / /phung po lnga la rab tu gang / /sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin gyis/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kAya badzra
<p>101a.7</p>swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de bzhin lce dbus pad+ma la/ /a las rdo rje 'dod chags te/ /rab zhugs de la gsol gdab cing / /rdo rje dag tu byin gyis brlab/ /chos kyi ngag lam dpal ldan pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng nyid byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>gsung gis mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms te/ /deng nyid byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol/ /lce ni 'phro bar rnam bsgoms te/ /rang ngag chos rnams kun gyi gnas/ /gsung
<p>101b.2</p>dbyangs thams cad rnam dag dang / /chos kyi ngag tu byin gyis brlab/ /ngag de rdo rje chos kyi ni/ /nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs/ /bdag gi tshig kyang de bzhin du/ /chos 'chad lta bur 'gyur bar shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ snying gi zla ba la
<p>101b.3</p>dmigs pa/ /kha dog mthing shun lta bu yi/ /hUM zhes pa yi rdo rje sems/ /'od zer rnam lnga shin tu 'bar/ /sngar smos pa yi rim pa yis/ /rdo rje sems la gsol btab nas/ /de ni zhugs par bsgom byas te/ /sems ni byin gyis brlab par bya/ /dpal ldan
<p>101b.4</p>sems ni rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas
<p>101b.5</p>su/ /rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol/ /snying la dpal be'u bsam pa ni/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ /'od zer lngas 'khrigs lta bu ni/ /nga rgyal bskyed pas sbyar bar bya/ /kun du bzang po'i sems ni gang / /gsang dbang gi ni blo ldan pa/ /bdag dang de dang
<p>101b.6</p>'dra ba'i sems/ /rdo rje 'chang 'drar gyur par shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ dbang bskur gong ma bzhin bsgom pa/ /chen po'i rgyu mthun la sogs yin/ /mi bskyod dbu brgyan sangs rgyas bzhin/ /lhag ma rang gi bdag dbang bskur/ /sku yi
<p>101b.7</p>dbang phyug mi bskyod pa/ /ngag gi dbang phyug thugs kyi dbang / /dbu rgyan de bzhin 'dod pa'o/ /de ltar rim pas dbang bskur nas/ /rang gi snying po 'od zer gyis/ /shes rab ma yi dkyil du ni/ /gzugs la sogs pa thim byas te/ /ba spu'i bu ga las byung ba'i/ /gzugs
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>kyi rdo rje sogs 'od ni/ /gzhal yas khang nas byung nas su/ /bar snang dkyil du khyab pa yis/ /bdag dang thub dbang mchod byas te/ /mchod dang mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rigs gsum
<p>102a.2</p>rigs lnga brgya rnams la/ /ye shes lnga dang phyag rgya dang / /sangs rgyas bdag nyid gzugs rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor chos rnams kyis bstod pa/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /rdo rje
<p>102a.3</p>dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par snang mdzad dga' chen po/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog /rdo rje ston la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen rgyal po shin tu zab/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dri ma med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ / 
<p>102a.4</p>rdo rje mtha' yas chags pa che/ /rnam par mi rtog rdo rje mkha'/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje don grub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung / /rang bzhin dag
<p>102a.5</p>pas gos pa med/ /rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zla ba nyi ma chu sman dri/ /rlung me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /'od ldan phyag 'tshal byin gyis brlab/ /de nyid gsum gyi sngags btab nas/ /lce la rdo rje hUM bkod de/ /ye shes bdud rtsi gang bsgoms nas/ /snying
<p>102a.6</p>ga'i zla ba'i dkyil gnas kun/ /dkyil 'khor de yis tshim par bya/ /snying 'od sprul pa mgon po yis/ /dbus kyi kun rtog yongs spangs te/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid byas nas/ /ye shes sa bon dkyil du thim/ /snying ga'i phyag mtshan dkyil gnas pa/ /zla ba'i snying
<p>102a.7</p>po thig le gzugs/ /'od gsal rang gi yid bsgoms te/ /ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yang / /'od zer 'phros pas gsal byed de/ /de yang snying la bzhugs bsams nas/ /de ni ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /de nas lus kyi nang
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>kun du/ /de yis kun du gsal byas te/ /so so ba spu'i 'od zer gyis/ /'gro ba'i don ni rdzogs par bya/ /rang gi phyag mtshan phra mo la/ /rang rig thub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /'ong 'bar dam pa'i shes rab thogs/ /rig ma'i sna la gnas par bsgom/ /brtan pa'i
<p>102b.2</p>mtshan ma mthong ma thag /de yi 'od zer 'phro ba ni/ /sangs rgyas sna tshogs phyag mtshan bsnams/ /yang dang yang du 'phro bar bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang / /'od zer lnga yi ye shes las/ /'phros nas sngags ni zlos byed pa/ /lhan cig yang na rim par bya/ / 
<p>102b.3</p>dbugs phyung 'phro ba spro byas te/ /dbugs bsdu sngags kyang bsdu bar bya/ /sku la sogs pa'i spro bsdu ba/ /rim pa rim par bzlas par bya/ /de ltar bzlas na nam mkha' la/ /sku sogs de dag rnams kyis khyab/ /sngon bzhin rang gi 'od zer mchod/ /dbugs phyung rig
<p>102b.4</p>ma'i chu bo yis/ /gsang ba'i rig ma le lo yis/ /bde bar zhugs nas dbang gyur pa/ /ye shes sangs rgyas chu bo rnams/ /dgag pa'i dbugs kyis thim nas su/ /rang gi dkyil du thim par bya/ /rgyu mthun la sogs mos pa yis/ /thig le phra mo gsang gsum
<p>102b.5</p>la/ /'bring po chung sogs phye nas su/ /sbyor ba bsnyen sogs de bzhin no/ /rang snying de nyid mchog gzigs pa/ /sems la nyams su phyung gyur na/ /spyan sogs yon tan dbyangs kyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor gsol nas mchod par bya/ /spyi bor zla ba phyag mtshan
<p>102b.6</p>ldan/ /dam pa'i sems ni chu rgyun ni/ /'bab pa rim par byas nas su/ /sku gsung thugs la thim par bya/ /de ltar dbugs phyung bzlas nas su/ /mkhas pas mchod pa la sogs bya/ /ci phyir de bzhin nyid gsum dag /thogs pa spangs nas rdzogs par bya/ /de
<p>102b.7</p>'dra de nyid dang bral ba'i/ /'gro ba thams cad mthong nas su/ /de dag phan phyir snying rje yis/ /smon lam kun du mngon par bya/ /ting nge 'dzin las langs nas su/ /'gying bag gtso bo dang ldan nas/ /spyod pa sangs rgyas shes byas te/ /spyod yul rnams kyis rab tu mchod/ / 
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>'jam dpal rdo rje bdag nyid kun/ /rang bzhin las ni spyod yul 'gro/ /spyod yul de dag bsgom pa nyid/ /rang rang dag nas gnas phyir ro/ /rtag pa la sogs gnas pa'i phyir/ /so so rang rig chos su gnas/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
<p>103a.2</p>gzugs/ /sems dpa' dag pa dang ldan pas/ /dbugs kyi rtog pa spangs nas su/ /bya ba thams cad bya ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa mtha' yas 'di/ /rtag tu sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gtso bo ni/ /gzhi yi sa bon
<p>103a.3</p>gyis bskyed la/ /rang gis bza' ba za dus na/ /rang snying de bzhin nyid dmigs dang / /bdud rtsis sangs rgyas kun tshim bya/ /chos nyid kyi ni kun dag la/ /de nyid gsum gyi sngags btab nas/ /dkyil 'khor rang gi rig pa'i lha/ /de yis tshim par byas nas mchod/ /phyi yi
<p>103a.4</p>sbyin sreg rjes dpags te/ /sems ni sems nyid yin pa'i phyir/ /bla na med pa 'di yin te/ /ye shes me ni 'bar byed nas/ /phung po'i bud shing bsregs pa'o/ /'dod pa 'di dag thams cad ni/ /rang rang lha dag rang bzhin skye/ /de ltar bdag gzhan mchod byed pa/ / 
<p>103a.5</p>bde bar gshegs pa'i dam tshig yin/ /gang zhig la ni de sku sogs/ /sangs rgyas kun la mchod byed dang / /rjes su rig pa 'gro ba'i don/ /rtag tu mnyam gzhag bsam gtan bya/ /gang zhig lus ngag dngos po las/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid che/ /las de
<p>103a.6</p>yang dag brtsams nas su/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /rnam rtog dngos po gcig pu la/ /sna tshogs rnam par snang ba ste/ /sdug bsngal bde ba grol 'byung ba/ /ci phyir las ma lus pa yin/ /de phyir dge dang mi dge las/ /lus la sogs pa'i rtog
<p>103a.7</p>pa 'byung / /kun rtog thams cad nges grol nas/ /ye shes rtogs par ga la 'gyur/ /don yod rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtsor/ /bsams nas dam tshig bslab don du/ /snying gar las kyi rdo rje khang / /bsams nas kun bdag dbang bskur bya/ /bla ma brnyas
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>sogs skyon gyur na/ /yon dang bcas par ston mo dbul/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ /bdag nyid la ni pha rol tu/ /rim pa gcig ni rnam bsams pa/ /snga ma'i gzugs ni gnas gyur nas/ /zhe sdang gzugs su rnam par gnas/ /an+d+ra nI la'i mdog
<p>103b.2</p>lta bu/ /zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs/ /mi 'khrugs 'bar ba spyi bor 'chang / /'jig rten khams kun 'khrugs par byed/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od/ /dmar ba'i spyan ni 'jigs pa che/ /rgyan rnams
<p>103b.3</p>kun gyis rab tu brgyan/ /khro gnyer zhi ba 'dod chags che/ /zhal gsum dag ni rnam par 'chang / /rang gi dam tshig mnyam par ldan/ /phyag drug gis ni mngon par brgyan/ /'dzam bu na da'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis rnam 'khrigs pa'i/ /rdo rje chen po rtse
<p>103b.4</p>dgu pa/ /de yi phyag tu rnam par bsgom/ /sngar gsungs pa yi rim bzhin du/ /phyag rgya phyi ma rnam par bsgom/ /zhe sdang rdo rjer byin brlabs nas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu spro/ /dzin dzi ka /sa bon las ni bskyed bya ba/ /rnam par snang mdzad gtso bo
<p>103b.5</p>ste/ /zhi ba'i cha lugs dag dang ldan/ /phyogs ni thams cad snang bar mdzad/ /ston ka'i 'dam bu'i 'od 'dra ba/ /ral pa'i cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /mi 'khrugs pas ni dbang bskur zhing / /sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /dkar dang gnag dang
<p>103b.6</p>dmar chen po/ /kha dog gsum pa zhal gsum pa/ /'od zer sna tshogs chen pos brgyan/ /phyag drug rnam par bsgom par bya/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dkar/ /g.yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsam/ /dril bu nor bu ral gri rnams/ /g.yon pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsgom/ / 
<p>103b.7</p>snying las de bzhin byung nas ni/ /phyogs kun du ni rnam par gzigs/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mdzad la sogs/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /gti mug lam la rab gnas pa'i/ /sems can ma lus sbyangs nas ni/ /slar log mdun gyi phyogs dag na/ /zla ba'i
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>dbus su rnam par gnas/ /rat+na d+h+r-ika /sa bon las ni skyes pa yi/ /dkon mchog dbal ni mkhas pas bskyed/ /ral pa cod pan 'chang la zhi/ /mi 'khrugs dbang bskur bas ni brgyan/ /zhal gsum kha dog gsum pa ste/ /ser dang dmar dang
<p>104a.2</p>dkar ba'i zhal/ /thams cad rgyan dang rab ldan pa'i/ /phyag drug pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /nor bu rdo rje 'khor lo ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag tu bsgom par bya/ /dril bu ral gri pad+ma ser/ /g.yon pa dag tu rnam par bsgom/ /de bzhin snying ga nas byung nas/ /'jig
<p>104a.3</p>rten khams ni rnam par gzigs/ /nga rgyal gnas la gnas pa yi/ /sems can thams cad sbyong bar mdzad/ /rin chen chen po slar gshegs nas/ /thams cad dbang bskur phun sum tshogs/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i g.yas phyogs kyi/ /rin chen dbus su rnam par bzhugs/ / 
<p>104a.4</p>a ro l-ika/ sa bon dag las grub pa yis/ /rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas bskyed/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /mi 'khrugs pas ni cod pan brgyan/ /zhi ba ral pa cod pan 'chang / /dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /phyag drug
<p>104a.5</p>pa ni bsgom par bya/ /g.yon pa 'gying bas pad+ma 'dzin/ /dril bu dkur brten phan phyir te/ /g.yas par pad+ma skyong mdzad cing / /thugs kar pad+ma kha yang 'byed/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /g.yon gnyis rin chen ral gri bsnams/ /snying ga nas ni byung gyur
<p>104a.6</p>nas/ /thams cad phyogs su rnam par gzigs/ /sems can 'dod chags ldan sbyong ste/ /'dam can chu yi pad+ma bzhin/ /slar gshegs pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /rgyab kyi phyogs su mngon par bzhugs/ /pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ sa bon las ni grub pa yi/ /rdo rje gdon mi za ba bskyed/ / 
<p>104a.7</p>ljang gu baiDUR+Ya 'dra ba/ /ral pa cod pan rdo rje gnas/ /thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /ljang gu gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /'od zer rnam lnga 'khrigs par 'bar/ /phyag drug rnam par bsam par bya/ /ral gri rdo rje rgya gram dang / /'khor lo g.yas pa'i phyag tu bsgom/ / 
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>dril bu pad+ma'i sdong bcas dang / /nor bu g.yon pa'i phyag tu bsam/ /de bzhin snying ga nas byung nas/ /phyogs bcu kun du gzigs mdzad de/ /brdzun tshig smra ba'i lam gnas pa'i/ /sems can thams cad kun du spyod/ /sna tshogs chen po slar gshegs nas/ /gru gsum dkyil
<p>104b.2</p>'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems kyi byang phyogs su/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang / /yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste/ /rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis/ /'dod dang grol bar rab grub pa'o/ /dwe Shar ti/ gsang
<p>104b.3</p>sngags las ni grub pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i yum gyi lha mo bskyed/ /sngo bsangs ut+pal mdog 'dra ba/ /yid du 'ong ba mdzes pa'i zhal/ /gnag dang dmar dang dkar 'dra ba'i/ /zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /mi 'khrugs cod pan gnas byas pa'i/ /phyag drug pa ni
<p>104b.4</p>bsgom par bya/ /rgyal mo rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin/ /sngo dmar ut+pal phyag na bsnams/ /g.yon pa 'gying bas dril bu ste/ /rin chen ral gri rtag tu 'chang / /snying ga nas ni byung gyur nas/ /phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs mdzad de/ /bgegs chen gyis ni 'jigs rnams
<p>104b.5</p>la/ /rtag tu srung ba nyid du mdzad/ /'bar bslar yang gshegs nas ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus ma yin/ /lho yi grwar ni bzhugs nas kyang / /rab dgyes rdo rje la yang gzigs/ /mo ha ra ti/ gsang sngags las ni grub pa yi/ /spyan gyi lha mo bskyed par bya/ / 
<p>104b.6</p>ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rnam par snang mdzad spyi bor gnas/ /me tog sna tshogs tshad med pas/ /dbu la thod du rnam par bcings/ /dkar dang gnag dang dmar chen po'i/ /zhal gsum pa ni rab tu 'bar/ /cha lugs brgyad dang ldan pa ste/ /'od zer dkar pos kun
<p>104b.7</p>du 'khrigs/ /rgyan rnams kun dang ldan pa yi/ /phyag drug pa ni rnam par bsam/ /rgyal mo 'khor lo rdo rje 'dzin/ /ut+pal dkar po phyag na bsnams/ /rin chen sdong bu g.yon na ste/ /dril bu ral gri 'dzin pa'i mchog /de bzhin snying ga nas byung nas/ /phyogs bcu
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>dag tu rnam par gzigs/ /gdon nad na ba'i sems can dag /zhi ba'i gnas kyis zhi bar mdzad/ /snang mdzad de ni slar gshegs nas/ /dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /shar gyi grwar ni bzhugs nas kyang / /rdo rje mgon la gzigs par mdzad/ / 
<p>105a.2</p>rA ga ra ti/ gsang sngags las ni grub pa yi/ /gos dkar mo ni bskyed par bya/ /zhal mdzes spyan ni ring ba ste/ /pad+ma rA ga zla mdog 'dra/ /zhal gsum dag ni bzhad pa'i zhal/ /dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba ste/ /snang ba mtha' yas cod pan gnas/ /thams cad rgyan
<p>105a.3</p>gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sgyu 'phrul mtshon las kun du 'byung / /'dod chags dmar po 'chad la dga'/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kun rdzogs pa'i/ /phyag drug rnam par bsgom par bya/ /g.yon pa 'gying bas dril bu dang / /sdong bu lor bcas ut+pal 'dzin/ /sgeg
<p>105a.4</p>dang bcas pa'i g.yas pa yis/ /ut+pal dmar po kha yang 'byed/ /gnyis ni rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis nor bu ral gri 'chang / /snying ga nas ni byung gyur nas/ /thams cad phyogs su rnam par gzigs/ /gza' sogs kyis skams sems can rnams/ /tshe dang mtshungs
<p>105a.5</p>par rgyas par mdzad/ /slar gshegs pad+ma'i dbus su bzhugs/ /badzra ra ti/ gsang sngags las ni grub pa yi/ /lha mo sgrol ma mkhas pas bskyed/ /yan lag mtshan rnams kun dang ldan/ /bud med ma rungs myos mdzad brtson/ /mdzes pa'i zhal ni spyan ring ba/ /margad
<p>105a.6</p>ser po'i mdog kyang 'dra/ /gdon mi za mchog cod pan mdzes/ /me tog phreng gi cod pan dkris/ /ljang gu nag dang dkar 'dra ba'i/ /zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kun rdzogs pa'i/ /phyag drug pa ni bsam par bya/ /rdo rje rgya gram 'khor lo 'dzin/ / 
<p>105a.7</p>ut+pal ser po phyag na bsnams/ /g.yon pa 'gying bas dril bu ste/ /rin chen ral gris phyag ni brgyan/ /snying ga nas ni byung gyur nas/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gis rmongs pa'i/ /sems can dbang du byed pa ni/ /'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis te/ /sems ni med ltar dbang gyur
<p>105b</p>
<p>105b.1</p>nas/ /thams cad mngon par phyogs par gnas/ /slar gshegs dam tshig dbus su ni/ /byang gi phyogs kyi grwar ni bzhugs/ /gsang sngags yi ge las grub pa'i/ /mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' bskyed/ /rigs kyi bdag pos dbang bskur ba'i/ /kha dog
<p>105b.2</p>gsum dag zhal gsum pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa/ /phyag drug pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /so so'i rigs bzhin kha dog brgya/ /de dag thams cad bsgom par bya/ /sgrol ma'i phyag rgyar gsungs pa ni/ /kun du bzang po bsgom par bya/ /ut+pal yongs su bsal
<p>105b.3</p>nas ni/ /pad+ma de la sbyin par bya/ /byams pa klu shing me tog ste/ /lhag ma rnam snang mdzad kyi gnas/ /'jam dpal dril bu ral gri mchog /de bzhin du ni rab tu gnas/ /lag pa g.yon pa sa la gnon/ /g.yas pa zhu ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /lhag ma kun du bzang po yi/ /phyag
<p>105b.4</p>rgya de ni rnam par bsgom/ /shar gyi ngos la gnyis nyid de/ /sa yi snying po byams pa gnas/ /lhor ni phyag na rdo rje dang / /nam mkha' zhes bstan kun du gnas/ /nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rnam par gnas/ /byang du sgrib sel bstan pa dang / /

<p>106a.1</p>rdo rje zhabs drug bskyed par bya/ /sprin sngo lta bu'i kha dog la/ /gsus po che la stobs po che/ /'od zer stug po dag gis 'bar/ /kun du khros pa'i 'jigs dang bcas/ /spyan dmar zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs/ /zhal gsum dag ni rnam par

<p>106a.3</p>dril bu mchog /dgra sta zhags pa bsdigs par bcas/ /snying ga nas ni byung gyur pa/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /g.yas brkyang gnon pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /shar phyogs kyi ni sgor gnas so/ /pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita/ ye shes las ni grub pa yi/ /rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub

<p>106a.7</p>du 'greng / /rdo rje snang bas rnam par brgyan/ /phyag drug pa ni 'jigs pa che/ /zhal ni khro gnyer mdzad pa ste/ /phyag na pad+ma bskyod pa che/ /ral gri gtun shing mtshon cha'i phyag /g.yas brkyang 'gying ba'i tshul du gnas/ /g.yon pa dgra sta zhags pa 'chang / /khro bo snying ga nas

<p>108b.6</p>de yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi dpal ni lha dang mi'i 'byor pa thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad la bya'o/ /de gnyis dang ldan pas dpal ldan zhes bya'o/ /dpal gyi sgras ni lha mo bzhi la
<p>108b.7</p>sogs pa la yang bya ste/ de rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul du gnas pas dpal ldan no/ /rdo rje ni yang dag pa'i ye shes sems dpa' ni de nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems dpa' zhes bya ste/ sems can thams cad dang mthun par sku bstan pas sems dpa'o/ / 
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>mgon po sangs rgyas kun ngo bo/ /zhes pa ni thugs rje'i rang bzhin yin pas sems can gyi bsam pa dang mthun par thams cad kyi don mdzad pas mgon po zhes bya/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yin pas so/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rgyal ba'i
<p>109a.2</p>gtso/ /zhes pa ni sems can zhe sdang can thams cad 'dul ba'i cha lugs su bstan pas zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi mchog tu gyur pa dang / /dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yin pas na rgyal ba'i gtso/ lha mo zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
<p>109a.3</p>kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul du bde ba chen po rtag tu nyams su myong ba la bya'o/ /dad pas zhes pa ni gus pa dang bcas pas so/ /bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal nas/ /de ltar phyag 'tshal ba'i don ni rgyud thams cad
<p>109a.4</p>kyi rgyal po gsang ba 'dus pa 'di gang zag blo dman pa rnams kyis rtogs shing go dka' bas de lta bu'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir ro/ /dpal ni badzra satwa/ de dang ldan pas dpal ldan no/ /gsang 'dus ni rgyud kyi mtshan no/ /don ni nges pa'o/ /rtogs pa ni sems kyis
<p>109a.5</p>so/ /gsang ba ni tshig gis so/ /sems can ni khams gsum na gnas pa'o/ /phan pa ni mtho ris dang thar pa thob par bya ba rgyud 'di la 'jug par bya'o/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sgrub pa'o/ /de yang gang zhe na/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o/ /thabs ni yan lag
<p>109a.6</p>go/ /'di ni brtsams pa'i dngos po'o/ /bshad par bya zhes pa ni dam bca' ba'o/ /dang po sems bskyed ma thag go/ /sngags pa zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags kyi tshul la spyod pa'o/ /nges pa ni the tshom med pa'o/ /da ni 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin te/ rdo rje ni yang dag pa'i don te de la
<p>109a.7</p>ma nor bar ston cing bde ba chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'o/ /mnyes par bya ba yang rnam pa gsum ste phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'o/ /phyi ni lus dang longs spyod do/ /nang ni shes rab rnam gsum gyi sgo nas so/ /gsang ba ni gsang ba'i mchod pas so/ /de ltar slob dpon mnyes
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>par byas nas dbang rnam gsum thob nas gnang ba ni sgrubs shig ces bya ba'i don to/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa zin nas so/ /sgrub pa ni gang yang rung ba'i sgrub pa'i dngos po'o/ /brtsam par bya ba ni 'jug pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi don ni sgra las drangs na
<p>109b.2</p>maN+Da ni snying po'o/ /la ni a da na ste len pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor pas dkyil 'khor ro/ /der zhugs pa ni tshul bzhin du slob dpon gyis bstan zhing dbang bskur ba'o/ /de bzhin ni 'dra ba'i don gsang ba ni thun mong ma yin pa dang / /rtog ge bas ma yin pa'o/ /nyid ni ma nor ba
<p>109b.3</p>dkyil 'khor gyi don dang gnyis su med pa'i don to/ /shes pa ni go ba'o/ /kun byed thams cad za ba yis/ /zhes pa ni rtog pa med cing gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa'o/ /the tshom med par dngos grub thob/ /ces bya ba ni yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pas bsgrubs na yid kyi 'dod pa'i don
<p>109b.4</p>grub ces bya ba'i don to/ /gtso bo ni yi dam gyi lha dang rdo rje slob dpon gnyis so/ /mi phyed pa ni mi 'gyur ba dang rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /dad pa ni yid ches pa dang gus pa dang chags pa'o/ /rnam pa ni tha dad pa mi rtog pa'i blo ni tha dad pa'i 'du shes med cing gnyis su med pa'o/ /dam tshig
<p>109b.5</p>ni mi 'da' ba ste sku gsung thugs la sogs pa'o/ /sdom pa ni mi g.yeng ba'o/ /gnas pa ni ldan pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs na sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i ngang nyid yin pas na dor ba'i tshig go/ /dkyil
<p>109b.6</p>'khor dag ni dman pa dang / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni gong du bstan pa'i yon tan dang mi ldan par rang bzo dang gzu lums su byas shing bsgrubs na/ 'bras bu mi 'thob cing byas pa chud zos pas byar mi rung bar bstan/ de lta bas na dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan te/ dam tshig
<p>109b.7</p>ni bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas so/ /sdom pa ni kha na ma tho ba med par dang du len pa'o/ /de yang gang yin zhe na/ sha la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga'o/ /sha ni sha chen/ rak+ta ni khrag thams cad/ dri chen dang rdo rje chu yang kun gyi'o/ /sems ni lnga pa byang chub byung ba zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med
<p>110a</p>
<p>110a.1</p>pa'i rol pa las byung ba yin pas so/ /sngags pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa sgrub pa/ cho gas zhes pa ni bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa dang 'gro nas 'byung ba'i thabs so/ /nyin gcig bzhin du ni dus thams cad du'o/ /sbyang ba ni
<p>110a.2</p>hUM gis so/ /'bar ba ni oM gyis so/ /rtogs pa ni AHyis so/ /dogs pa ni 'grub mi 'grub pa'i the tshom mo/ /med pa ni spangs pa'i sems so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ci ltar gshegs pa bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /de yang gang zhe na thabs
<p>110a.3</p>dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i tshul bsgoms shing bsgrubs pas bde ba chen po'i ngang du gyur pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o/ /mnyes pa ni dgyes pa'i don to/ /de yang mngon sum du gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ mnyes
<p>110a.4</p>pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu 'thob pa'o/ /sbyang pa'i thabs ni sgrub pa'i rdzas snod du bzhag la de'i steng du hUM gcig 'bar bar bsgom/ /de'i 'od zer gyis ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs pa'i dri ma thams cad bsregs par bsam/ de ltar rnam par dag par byas la/ de'i steng du zla ba'i
<p>110a.5</p>dkyil 'khor dang a gcig bskyed/ a las 'od zer 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la phog pas zhu ste/ bdud rtsi'i thigs pa tshul bzhin du zhu zhing gnyis su med par song bas bdud rtsir gyur pa ni rtogs pa'o/ /de'i steng du oM bsgom zhing 'phro 'du bya ba ni ma 'bar gyi bar du'o/ / 
<p>110a.6</p>de ltar byas shing spyad na sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob pas dam tshig dam pa'o/ /de ltar sha rnam pa lnga yang sgrub pa'i rdzas yin pa dang / rtog pa spong ba dang / rang bzhin gyis mthu yod pas spyad par bya ba bstan/ de yang glang po che'i sha ni lo tsa nar byin gyis brlab cing rnam
<p>110a.7</p>par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i tshul du spyad/ rta sha ni rat+na lo tsa na dang rin chen 'byung ldan gyi tshul du spyad/ sha chen ni mA ma kI dang rdo rje sems dpa'/ ba lang ni na bza' dkar mo dang snang ba mtha' yas/ khyi ni sgrol ma dang don yod grub pa'i tshul du spyad/ mchog ni thun mong
<p>110b</p>
<p>110b.1</p>ma yin pas mchog go/ /'di rnams kyang sbyong ba la sogs pa gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /sku gsung thugs sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'jig rten gyi zas spangs la rtag tu sgrub pa'i dam rdzas spyad pa'i don to/ /gzhan ni zan la sogs pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pas de dag bde
<p>110b.2</p>blag tu ma rnyed na zas skom thams cad sha rnams yin par bsam zhing spyad par bya bar bstan/ rdo rje sbyor ba 'di dag ces bya ba ni gong gi sbyong ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams so/ /de ltar spyad pa'i yon tan ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /zan dang khur ba
<p>110b.3</p>la sogs pa bza' ba'am/ yang na chu dang chang la sogs pa btung ba'ang rung 'jig rten pas mi nus pa'i dka' ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pas brtul zhugs can gyis zas skom ci za ba dri chu sman lnga sha lnga ci ltar sbyor bas sbyong ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin cho ga bzhin du rung bar bya'o/ / 
<p>110b.4</p>da ni rnal 'byor pas tha mal pa'i tshul du gnas dang dam rdzas dang yo byad spyad du mi rung bas de'i ting nge 'dzin bstan/ rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa/ /zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs dang mtshan dang dpe byad dang rgyan la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad dang
<p>110b.5</p>ldan pa'i lha gang yang rung ba bsgom pa'i don to/ /de ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i lus ngag yid gsum la sku gsung thugs kyi lha bsgom pa bstan/ rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i don/ yi ni de'i don/ de yang ci ltar bsgom zhe na/ bdag gi snying gi bar snang la a las bskyed
<p>110b.6</p>pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM las ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar ba rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad dang ldan par bsgom mo/ /spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du oM las rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang ldan par bsgom/ 
<p>110b.7</p>lce'i steng du pad+ma bskyed la a las snang ba mtha' yas bsgom/ hUM las rdo rje bsgom pa ni ye shes sems dpa' bskyed pa la bya'o/ /a las ni snang ba mtha' yas/ oM las ni rnam par snang mdzad/ sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni spyi bo dang lce'i steng du de gnyis kyi sku bskyed pa la bya/ de ltar bdag
<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>lhar bsgom zhing dam rdzas dang bza' btung thams cad ni sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur pa'i don to/ /'di ni dam tshig ces pa ni gong du bstan pa'i dam rdzas la sogs pa'i spyad pa'i tshul lo/ /mchog ni bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par
<p>111a.2</p>byed pa'i thabs kyi rab yin pas so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa lnga'o/ /mnyes pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin du spyad pas dgyes pa dang mngon du gyur pa la bya'o/ /mchog ni sku gsung thugs so/ /dngos grub kyang tshe 'di nyid la thob pa'i don
<p>111a.3</p>to/ /thams cad ni 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa grub kyang bsdu'o/ /de bas na dam tshig mchog ces bya'o/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas dam tshig dang dus thams cad du ldan par bya dgos par bstan pa/ rtag pa zhes pa ni dus thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /gzhan ni bdag las
<p>111a.4</p>gzhan pa 'phags pa rnams so/ /'phrog pa ni bdag gir bya ba'o/ /spyir 'phags pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs bsgom zhing thob par bya ba la'ang bya'o/ /gnod sbyin dang rgyal po la sogs pa'i nor kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgo nas blangs shing spyod pa la yang bya'o/ / 
<p>111a.5</p>rmad du byung ba gsod pa dang / zhes pa ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin du mi blta zhing / bdag tu blta ba la sogs pa'i lta ba log pa'o/ /de la de skad ci'i phyir bya zhe na/ yang dag pa'i don gyi gnas byed pa dang ngan song du gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /gso ba ni
<p>111a.6</p>spong ba'o/ /rmad du byung ba ni dkon mchog gsum dang rdo rje slob dpon dang sems can mang po la gnod par byed pa'o/ /gsod pa ni kha na ma tho ba med par snying rje'i sgo nas bsgral ba'o/ /'dod pa ni sku gsung thugs/ chags pa ni gzhan mi sems pa'o/ /rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i
<p>111a.7</p>don to/ /de nyid ni ma nor ba'o/ /spyod pa ni bsgom pa'o/ /mdor na sku gsung thugs rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom pa la bya'o/ /'dod chags ni bla na med pa'i bde ba'o/ /spyod pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul gyis nyams su myong ba'o/ /'di zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gsum mo/ /sdom pa ni
<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>srung ba'o/ /bsdams pa'o zhes pa bsrung ba'i nang na khyad par du bstan pa'o/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i rgyu dam tshig rnams bstan nas/ de dang mi mthun pa'i spyod pa rnams spang bar ston te/ dam bca' ni nyan thos kyi spyod pa dang kr-i ya'o/ /brtul zhugs ni mu stegs can
<p>111b.2</p>brag la mchong ba la sogs pa'o/ /dka' spyod ni me lnga bsten pa dang zas mi za ba la sogs pa'o/ /brten pas mi 'grub ces bya ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod pa rnams spyod pas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub mi thob pas spongs shig pa'i don to/ /'dod pa ni sku gsung
<p>111b.3</p>thugs/ longs spyod ni gnyis su med par bsgom pa'o/ /thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la bya'o/ /yang na 'dod pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad do/ /bstan pa zhes pa dus thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par spyad pa'o/ /myur du 'grub ces bya ba ni de ltar
<p>111b.4</p>bskyed pas sems las su rung bas tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu 'thob pa'i don to/ /slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te/ /zhes pa ni ma hA yo ga'i sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas kr-i ya'am mu stegs pa ltar 'phral du bslang zhing sngags bzla bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ngag
<p>111b.5</p>yid gsum thang chad pa dang tshul bzhin du bsgom mi nus pa dang / ma rnyed na bkres skom gyis nyon mongs pa dang sems las su mi rung bas so/ /slong la dga' bar mi bya'o/ /zhes pa ni 'phral slong ba la de ltar skyon yod pas sngon du bslang zhing gzung ngam snyam na/ de yang
<p>111b.6</p>yid dang 'thad pa mi rnyed pas mi rung ngo / /yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pas bya ba'i don to/ /yan lag mi gnyis zhes bya ba ni kr-i ya ba ltar bdag dam tshig sems dpar bsgom zhing ye shes sems dpa' logs su mchod pa bzhin du mi bya bar ye shes sems dpa'
<p>111b.7</p>dang bdag gnyis su med par bsgom zhing 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad bzla ba'i don/ yang na yan lag mi gnyis zhes ba ni gzungs ma dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul du 'dug nas bzla ba'i don to/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod ni 'dod pa thams cad do/ /de yang gzungs kyi lha mo la
<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>sogs pa'i tshul du bsgom zhing spyad pa'i don to/ /de ltar spyad pa'i yon tan bstan pa/ lus dang ngag yid bder gnas na/ /zhes pa ste/ slong ba'i zas spang zhing 'dod pa thams cad spyad pas lus ngag yid gsum las su rung ba'i don to/ /byang chub dam pa ni
